nodes.title: Speak to Westerly Breeze at (I-5) in Western Adoulin (you must zone and wait until the following gam
nodes.description: Speak to Westerly Breeze at (I-5) in Western Adoulin (you must zone and wait until the following game day after completing the previous quest).

nodes.title: Trade him a Cursed Beverage to him to complete the quest.
nodes.description: Trade him a Cursed Beverage to him to complete the quest.

nodes.title: With your main job as Ninja, speak with Ryoma in Norg at H-8 in a small corner at the dock overlooki
nodes.description: With your main job as Ninja, speak with Ryoma in Norg at H-8 in a small corner at the dock overlooking the water, for a cutscene. NOTE: You no longer need to be Ninja main job for the remainder of this quest.

nodes.title: Head to Port Bastok and talk to Kagetora in Warehouse #2 (F-6).
nodes.description: Head to Port Bastok and talk to Kagetora in Warehouse #2 (F-6).

nodes.title: Speak with Ensetsu located at (I-5) in the northernmost house east of the warehouse.
nodes.description: Speak with Ensetsu located at (I-5) in the northernmost house east of the warehouse. Note: If you have the quest Chasing Dreams active, and are on the sixth step in the quest (when you must trade five Eastern Gems to Patient Wheel), you will have to talk to Kagetora a few more times until he gives you the correct cutscene. Ensetsu provides additional background and sends you to Eastern Altepa Desert to investigate.

nodes.title: Wait for the next game day after previous quest, then check the Mischief Marker at Western Adoulin (
nodes.description: Wait for the next game day after previous quest, then check the Mischief Marker at Western Adoulin (J-11) for a cutscene.

nodes.title: Check the Door: Depository nearby to the northeast for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Check the Door: Depository nearby to the northeast for a cutscene.

nodes.title: Go to Rala Waterways (M-6) (enter from F-7 in Eastern Adoulin) and check the Entrance: Coliseum for
nodes.description: Go to Rala Waterways (M-6) (enter from F-7 in Eastern Adoulin) and check the Entrance: Coliseum for a cutscene.

nodes.title: Check the Entrance: Coliseum again to enter the battlefield against Pupadi Dollmohr, Celestin, and F
nodes.description: Check the Entrance: Coliseum again to enter the battlefield against Pupadi Dollmohr, Celestin, and Fabioso in Rala Waterways (U). Only Pupadi Dollmohr needs to be defeated to win the fight. Trusts and other players who are on or past this quest can aid in the battle. Tuffle-Buffle and Musto-Rusto will attempt to hinder you by dying. If they die, you will fail the fight. Tuffle-Buffle spams -ga II and -ga III nukes, while Musto-Rusto casts single-target enfeebling spells such as Paralyze and Slow. Tuffle-Buffle's and Musto-Rusto's attacks generate extreme amounts of enmity, so Tuffle-Buffle will likely tank all three NMs with his weak -ga spells. Fabioso uses the Blue Mage ability Unbridled Wisdom, and Celestin uses the Red Mage ability Chainspell. Fabioso seems to favor Area of Effect spells while under Wisdom. Can use Unbridled Learning to use one other spell, notably Absolute Terror. Fabioso can also use Charm, causing you to kill one of the Tarus extremely fast. Both Fabioso and Celestin are susceptible to gravity. Untested on Pupadi Dollmohr but probably its too. Subduction can inflict heavy gravity on all of them so that you can safely kite.

nodes.title: If you fail the fight, check the Sauce Barrel at Western Adoulin (J-5) near the Adoulin Waterfront.
nodes.description: If you fail the fight, check the Sauce Barrel at Western Adoulin (J-5) near the Adoulin Waterfront. You will have to trade a specified food to it, which can be purchased from Defliaa (I-11).

nodes.title: After you are victorious, check Door: Svenja's Manor in Western Adoulin (I-8) for a cutscene.
nodes.description: After you are victorious, check Door: Svenja's Manor in Western Adoulin (I-8) for a cutscene.

nodes.title: Purchase some Sickles (or Trailblazing or +1).
nodes.description: Purchase some Sickles (or Trailblazing or +1).

nodes.title: Go to Sih Gates and find a Harvesting Point, /laugh at it, then trade the sickle.
nodes.description: Go to Sih Gates and find a Harvesting Point, /laugh at it, then trade the sickle. If done successfully you have a chance of harvesting the Guffawshroom. Harvesting for key items is much easier with a full inventory.

nodes.title: Check the Door: Hospital at Western Adoulin (I-9) for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Check the Door: Hospital at Western Adoulin (I-9) for a cutscene.

nodes.title: Check the Mischief Marker for the final cutscene and 1000 EXP / limit points, management skill incre
nodes.description: Check the Mischief Marker for the final cutscene and 1000 EXP / limit points, management skill increase of 0.4 to a management skill of 1, and you're now an official manager of the Mummers' Coalition.

nodes.title: Examine the Cavernous Maw in South Gustaberg at (J-10) after flagging Dawn of Death.
nodes.description: Examine the Cavernous Maw in South Gustaberg at (J-10) after flagging Dawn of Death. You must have a Traverser Stone in your inventory to start the quest, or you will simply be allowed to enter with no cutscene. If you defeat Bennu without having the quest flagged, and then flag the quest later, you will automatically complete the quest after re-zoning.

nodes.title: Defeat the Roc NM Bennu.
nodes.description: Defeat the Roc NM Bennu.

nodes.title: Upon exiting the Cavernous Maw you will receive a cutscene and the quest will be completed.
nodes.description: Upon exiting the Cavernous Maw you will receive a cutscene and the quest will be completed.

nodes.title: Talk to Frescheque to start the quest.
nodes.description: Talk to Frescheque to start the quest. (3rd floor, Tavnazian Safehold at H-8)

nodes.title: Talk to Raminey.
nodes.description: Talk to Raminey. (3rd floor, Tavnazian Safehold at J-7)

nodes.title: Talk to Equette for an event.
nodes.description: Talk to Equette for an event. (2nd floor, Tavnazian Safehold at I-9)

nodes.title: Go to (I-8) near the lake in Lufaise Meadows and click on the ??? to spawn two Orc NMs:.
nodes.description: Go to (I-8) near the lake in Lufaise Meadows and click on the ??? to spawn two Orc NMs:

nodes.title: After completing Sharpening the Sword, speak with Ailbeche (J-9 in Northern San d'Oria) as a level 5
nodes.description: After completing Sharpening the Sword, speak with Ailbeche (J-9 in Northern San d'Oria) as a level 50+ Paladin and he'll request a Giant Shell Bug.

nodes.title: Talk to Exoroche at (K-7) in Helbort's Blades shop in Southern San d'Oria for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Talk to Exoroche at (K-7) in Helbort's Blades shop in Southern San d'Oria for a cutscene. You are not required to be a Paladin after this step.

nodes.title: Return to Ailbeche who tells you Giant Shell Bugs can be found in Crawlers' Nest.
nodes.description: Return to Ailbeche who tells you Giant Shell Bugs can be found in Crawlers' Nest.

nodes.title: Obtain one or several Giant Shell Bugs.
nodes.description: Obtain one or several Giant Shell Bugs. You can buy them on the AH, or follow the steps below. From the entrance to Crawler's Nest, use exit A at (H-8). On map 2, find the small alcove at (H-9). The ??? is tucked away in the far end. Check it to spawn Dreadbug, which will drop 1-4 Giant Shell Bugs.

nodes.title: Speak with Exoroche in Southern San d'Oria**.
nodes.description: Speak with Exoroche in Southern San d'Oria**

nodes.title: Trade the Giant Shell Bug to Ailbeche to initiate a cutscene in which he'll tell you where you can c
nodes.description: Trade the Giant Shell Bug to Ailbeche to initiate a cutscene in which he'll tell you where you can catch the "big one". You will still have the Giant Shell Bug after the cutscene. If you have multiples and you are skilled at fishing up monsters, you can skip this step until after you fish up Odontotyrannus.

nodes.title: At this point if you're not experienced with fishing it's advised to look over the Fishing page to g
nodes.description: At this point if you're not experienced with fishing it's advised to look over the Fishing page to get an idea on how to know when a monster/NM has bitten the hook, and how to deplete its stamina when it does bite. Tip: When you get a bite, do NOT press enter/confirm before depleting all stamina or you will lose the catch and your bait. Do NOT press enter/confirm to let a catch go when you've hooked something other than the NM or you will lose your bait. Wait it out, and the catch will eventually escape and your bait will be preserved.

nodes.title: Obtain a fishing rod (any will do), then head to the small pond on map 2 of Castle Oztroja.
nodes.description: Obtain a fishing rod (any will do), then head to the small pond on map 2 of Castle Oztroja. Prepare for a fight, and bring a friend or two if necessary. From the entrance, go through the Brass Door at (I-8) on map 1. To avoid the trapdoor, throw one lever and then quickly move backwards. On map 3, use exit F at (G-7). On map 7, use exit I at (I-7). Head to (H-8/H-9) on map 2 to find a pool of water with Oozes in it.

nodes.title: Fish up the NM Odontotyrannus using your fishing rod and Giant Shell Bug.
nodes.description: Fish up the NM Odontotyrannus using your fishing rod and Giant Shell Bug. You will lose your bait, and the NM will appear, ready to lay a beatdown on you. Upon victory it will drop Odontotyrannus (Item).

nodes.title: Return to Northern San d'Oria and trade the Odontotyrannus to Ailbeche.
nodes.description: Return to Northern San d'Oria and trade the Odontotyrannus to Ailbeche. (Optional) If you did not trade a Giant Shell Bug to Ailbeche before, do it now.

nodes.title: Trade the Odontotyrannus to Zaldon (H-9) at the Fisherman's Guild in Selbina to receive the Knight's
nodes.description: Trade the Odontotyrannus to Zaldon (H-9) at the Fisherman's Guild in Selbina to receive the Knight's Boots. (Zaldon may not accept the fish while Under the Sea quest is active, finish "Under the Sea" to allow Zaldon to accept Odontotyrannus)

nodes.title: Head back to Northern San d'Oria and speak to Ailbeche again.
nodes.description: Head back to Northern San d'Oria and speak to Ailbeche again.

nodes.title: Go to Southern San d'Oria and talk with Exoroche again.
nodes.description: Go to Southern San d'Oria and talk with Exoroche again.

nodes.title: Go to Chateau d'Oraguille in Northern San d'Oria and check Prince Trion's room at (H-7).
nodes.description: Go to Chateau d'Oraguille in Northern San d'Oria and check Prince Trion's room at (H-7). If your job is Paladin, this cutscene will also immediately start the next quest Under Oath.

nodes.title: This quest is automatically flagged after completing VW Op.
nodes.description: This quest is automatically flagged after completing VW Op. #126: Qufim Incursion.

nodes.description: Travel to Pashhow Marshlands (S) and examine the Veridical Conflux at (J-9) for a cutscene (near the Pashhow gate crystal).

nodes.title: After the cutscene the quest The Truth Is Out There is flagged automatically.
nodes.description: After the cutscene the quest The Truth Is Out There is flagged automatically.

nodes.title: Take the Holy Candle to Ilumida to complete the quest.
nodes.description: Take the Holy Candle to Ilumida to complete the quest.

nodes.title: Talk to Rising Solstice to receive a Western Adoulin patrol route.
nodes.description: Talk to Rising Solstice to receive a Western Adoulin patrol route.

nodes.description: Follow the route as shown in the key item and speak with a specific NPC in this order: Pioneers' Coalition (Zaoso E-8) Couriers' Coalition (Clemmar at G-8) Adoulin Waterfront (Kongramm at I-5) Platea Triumphus (Virsaint) at H-8) Inventors' Coalition (Shipilolo at J-9) Residential Area (Dangueubert at H-11) Mummers' Coalition (Nylene at H-10)

nodes.title: Return to Rising Solstice for your reward.
nodes.description: Return to Rising Solstice for your reward.

nodes.description: Nevela wants to hear the story surrounding the birth of a chocobo in the Upper Jeuno stables. The chocobo's mother is said to have been from the stables in Bastok.

nodes.description: Go to Bastok Mines and talk to Wobke (I-9) in the chocobo stables.

nodes.description: Go to the Pashhow Marshlands Outpost and examine the "Outpost Gate" for a cutscene. Ulzana will say "I give you until the day after tomorrow," however you can get and turn in the required items at any time.

nodes.title: Obtain three Warding Oils from Emerald Quadav in Castle Zvahl Baileys, Castle Zvahl Keep or Beadeaux
nodes.description: Obtain three Warding Oils from Emerald Quadav in Castle Zvahl Baileys, Castle Zvahl Keep or Beadeaux.

nodes.description: Head back to the Pashhow Marshlands Outpost and trade the oils to the "Outpost Gate" for another cutscene.

nodes.title: Head back to Bastok Mines to speak again with Wobke.
nodes.description: Head back to Bastok Mines to speak again with Wobke.

nodes.title: Head to Batallia Downs and go to location (H-6).
nodes.description: Head to Batallia Downs and go to location (H-6). On the hill in the northeast quadrant, examine a ??? on a headstone to spawn 5 NM tigers called Badshah.

nodes.title: Kill the Badshah and reexamine the ??? to get Silver Comet's collar.
nodes.description: Kill the Badshah and reexamine the ??? to get Silver Comet's collar. Easily soloed by any LV75 job. No need for any serious precautions such as Food or Reraise. High damage jobs would be able to win this battle even if the first tiger managed to paralyze them. Expect to take around 15-25 damage per hit at around 300 defense and those hits will be few and far between.

nodes.description: Complete the quest Deal with Tenshodo.

nodes.description: Click on Galmut's door to trade him the Clock tower oil and complete the quest.

nodes.description: With your Main Job set to Dragoon, go to Northern San d'Oria (E-5), outside the 2nd floor entrance to the Blacksmiths' guild.

nodes.description: Talk to Miaux. In a cutscene, you'll learn she wants her father's old armor repaired, but needs you to get a Altepa polishing stone for the repairs.

nodes.description: From this point on, this quest can be completed on any job.

nodes.description: Defeat Decurio I-III and re-examine the ??? to obtain the Altepa polishing stone. You do not have to be on Dragoon to spawn Decurio I-III. If you are in a party, Decurio I-III need only be defeated once. All party members with the quest flagged may then obtain the key item.

nodes.description: Talk to Ranpi-Monpi (Northern Windurst Waters) to learn that he cooked a bad batch of food for the Yagudo by accident. Ranpi-Monpi is located in the Culinarians' Guild.

nodes.description: Once you reach Giddeus, head down the ramp behind the food or drink altar (at F-8 or I-8), and go to (F-7) in the cave area. Just walk into the treasure room, even though Uu Zhoumo tells you to go away. Check the altar to receive the Key Item:Off Offering.

nodes.description: Take the Off Offering back to Ranpi-Monpi (just talk to him again).

nodes.description: Examine the Cavernous Maw in Valkurm Dunes at (I-9) after flagging Dawn of Death. If you defeat Cirein-croin without having the quest flagged, and then flag the quest later, you will automatically complete the quest after re-zoning.

nodes.description: Have one member of the alliance examine the ??? at (H-5) with the Glistening Orobon Liver and Doffed Poroggo Hat in his or her inventory in order to fight Cirein-croin.

nodes.description: Defeat this menace in order claim your reward. Must be within EXP range to receive credit.

nodes.description: Once you have killed Cirein-croin, return to Conflux 01 and exit via Cavernous Maw for CS and reward.

nodes.title: The quest will show up under the quests of the city you started it in and fame will be assigned to t
nodes.description: The quest will show up under the quests of the city you started it in and fame will be assigned to that city.

nodes.title: The starting NPC informs you that he/she found a lost package and asks you to return it to the owner
nodes.description: The starting NPC informs you that he/she found a lost package and asks you to return it to the owner, who is a passenger on the next airship.

nodes.title: If you accept the assignment, you will be shown the owner of the package.
nodes.description: If you accept the assignment, you will be shown the owner of the package.

nodes.title: The 'owner' is a randomly generated NPC, including Race, face/hair, and clothing.
nodes.description: The 'owner' is a randomly generated NPC, including Race, face/hair, and clothing. You will be allowed to repeat the viewing until you say "I got it". At this point you receive the Dropped Item.

nodes.title: Once airborne you have until you land to find the true owner.
nodes.description: Once airborne you have until you land to find the true owner. There will be 8 Passengers on this ship which look similar to the owner. The variations are always in the clothing and hair, and not the race/gender/face. Sometimes the Passengers are in hard-to-see places, such as the top of the canopy over the stairs from below deck, or behind covered section of the propeller engine.

nodes.title: If you return the Dropped Item to the incorrect passenger, he/she will take the package and you get
nodes.description: If you return the Dropped Item to the incorrect passenger, he/she will take the package and you get no reward. If you return the Dropped Item to the correct passenger you receive 500 gil.

nodes.title: The correct passenger is the same NPC for all people on that single trip.
nodes.description: The correct passenger is the same NPC for all people on that single trip.

nodes.title: If you do not turn the Dropped Item in by the time you land, you will still have it and must return
nodes.description: If you do not turn the Dropped Item in by the time you land, you will still have it and must return it to the NPC in the town you started in before attempting this quest again (from any nation).

nodes.title: This quest is automatically flagged after completing Between a Rock and Rift.
nodes.description: This quest is automatically flagged after completing Between a Rock and Rift.

nodes.description: Wait till the next game day after completing the previous quest, then speak with any Voidwatch Officer to receive a Voidwatch Alarum. This quest is now complete, and Third Tour of Duchy is automatically flagged.

nodes.title: This quest is automatically undertaken after completing When One Man Is Not Enough.
nodes.description: This quest is automatically undertaken after completing When One Man Is Not Enough.

nodes.title: Go to Sauromugue Champaign (S) and talk to Mham Lahrih at the West side of (K-9) on the top level of
nodes.description: Go to Sauromugue Champaign (S) and talk to Mham Lahrih at the West side of (K-9) on the top level of a small fort for a cutscene (just north of the maw). Attention! :The easiest ways to get to Mham Lahrih are to take the Campaign Arbiter from town to Meriphataud Mountains (S) and then head north and zone into Sauromugue Champaign (S) to get to her at (K-9), or to use the Survival Guide to travel to Sauromugue Champaign. It is both faster and safer.

nodes.title: Click on the Abandoned Mineshaft at the bottom of the stairs next to Mham Lahrih for another cutscen
nodes.description: Click on the Abandoned Mineshaft at the bottom of the stairs next to Mham Lahrih for another cutscene and to receive your Signal Firecracker. Have your party leader click it a second time to start the fight. If mission failed and Signal Firecracker was lost, you can get a new one by talking to Mham Lahrih again. You may only get one replacement each Vana'diel day.

nodes.title: Talk to Dhea Prandoleh in Windurst Waters (S) North (H-10) to complete the quest and get your reward
nodes.description: Talk to Dhea Prandoleh in Windurst Waters (S) North (H-10) to complete the quest and get your reward.

nodes.title: Baren-Moren asks you to fetch him some feathers.
nodes.description: Baren-Moren asks you to fetch him some feathers.

nodes.description: Trade him three Giant Bird Feathers These drop from Tabar Beaks and Axe Beaks in the Meriphataud Mountains and Sauromugue Champaign. These also drop at high rates from Abraxas in the northeastern portion of Lufaise Meadows.

nodes.title: Talk to Aquillina; she needs 4 flint stones to light her oven.
nodes.description: Talk to Aquillina; she needs 4 flint stones to light her oven.

nodes.description: Trade 4 flint stones to Aquillina to complete the quest.

nodes.description: Examine the Cavernous Maw on the Buburimu Peninsula at (F-7) after flagging Dawn of Death. You must have a Traverser Stone in your inventory to start the quest, or you will simply be allowed to enter with no cutscene. If you defeat Itzpapalotl without having the quest flagged, and then flag the quest later, you will automatically complete the quest after re-zoning.

nodes.title: Defeat the Wamoura NM Itzpapalotl, spawned from a ??? at (K-10).
nodes.description: Defeat the Wamoura NM Itzpapalotl, spawned from a ??? at (K-10).

nodes.title: Upon exiting the Cavernous Maw you will receive a cutscene and the quest will be completed.
nodes.description: Upon exiting the Cavernous Maw you will receive a cutscene and the quest will be completed. If you don't leave through Cavernous Maw you will receive a cutscene when you enter Buburimu Peninsula.

nodes.title: NOTE: You do not need to have Summoner unlocked to receive the reward.
nodes.description: NOTE: You do not need to have Summoner unlocked to receive the reward. Dialogue will be different to acknowledge this.

nodes.title: Enter the Walk of Echoes from the Veridical Conflux at (F-5) in Grauberg (S) or you can use your Lig
nodes.description: Enter the Walk of Echoes from the Veridical Conflux at (F-5) in Grauberg (S) or you can use your Lightsworm at any of the glowing ??? near the Maws to be teleported to Walk of Echoes.for a cutscene with Cait Sith that begins the quest.

nodes.title: This can be done right after Champion of the Dawn is completed, but you will have to leave and re-en
nodes.description: This can be done right after Champion of the Dawn is completed, but you will have to leave and re-enter the Walk of Echoes at the Veridical Conflux at (F-5) in Grauberg (S)

nodes.title: Examine the Ornate Door in the Walk of Echoes for another cutscene and a Butterfly-shaped key.
nodes.description: Examine the Ornate Door in the Walk of Echoes for another cutscene and a Butterfly-shaped key.

nodes.title: Examine the Ornate Door again to enter the battlefield.
nodes.description: Examine the Ornate Door again to enter the battlefield.

nodes.description: Talk to Gudav; he's worried about the project foreman since the project was cancelled. He wants you to keep an eye out for him and his dog.

nodes.title: (Optional) Talk to Dehlner in Port Bastok (H-5) and he'll give you a hint as to where the foreman is
nodes.description: (Optional) Talk to Dehlner in Port Bastok (H-5) and he'll give you a hint as to where the foreman is.

nodes.title: Obtain a Dog Collar.
nodes.description: Obtain a Dog Collar. They are dropped by Black Wolves in North Gustaberg. They are also available at the Auction House.

nodes.title: Bring it back to Gudav.
nodes.description: Bring it back to Gudav. He recognizes it and realizes that the foreman has gone on to the next life and the wolf was the undead soul of the foreman's dog. Grateful for an answer, he gives you your reward.

nodes.title: (Upper Jeuno G-7) Talk to Laila for a cutscene.
nodes.description: (Upper Jeuno G-7) Talk to Laila for a cutscene. You must be on DNC to trigger this CS.

nodes.title: Obtain a Dancer's Testimony from certain Quadav in Grauberg (S) or North Gustaberg (S) (Click here f
nodes.description: Obtain a Dancer's Testimony from certain Quadav in Grauberg (S) or North Gustaberg (S) (Click here for a chart of which Quadav drop the testimony).

nodes.title: (Upper Jeuno G-7) Trade the testimony to Laila as a DNC.
nodes.description: (Upper Jeuno G-7) Trade the testimony to Laila as a DNC. Laila will then ask if you are prepared. Upon accepting her challenge, you will be teleported to Qu'Bia Arena. Trade the Dancer's Testimony to the Burning Circle to begin the battle.This battle has a 10 minute time limit and is against Laila, who has an innate Regain effect. You will need the Rhapsody in Umber key in order to use Trusts in the battle. If you lose the fight, Laila can teleport you again if you provide a Dancer's Testimony.

nodes.title: Fighting Laila.
nodes.description: Fighting Laila. Laila has unusually high evasion, so sushi is the suggested food of choice. (Note: If using Trusts, don't worry about food.) Using Quickstep and Desperate Flourish will also help your accuracy during the fight. Laila will randomly use the Weapon Skills Shadowstitch, Viper Bite, Cyclone, Dancing Edge, or Shark Bite periodically when switching off between Steps and Flourishes of her own. Laila will cure herself using Curing Waltz for ~96 HP. She will also use either Drain Samba or Haste Samba. Due to the unusual survivability of this enemy, Hi-Potions are suggested, as you need all the TP you can get for Dancing Edges of your own. Note that it is not necessary to drop Laila to 0% to win the fight; roughly bringing her to 20% will end the battle. Similar to Maat, Laila will perform multiple Weapon Skills in a very short time period to instantly finish the battle if your time is close to ending.

nodes.title: Complete mission
nodes.description: Complete the mission: A Geothermal Expedition

nodes.title: The quest will automatically flag upon checking the Cavernous Maw in La Theine Plateau with a Traver
nodes.description: The quest will automatically flag upon checking the Cavernous Maw in La Theine Plateau with a Traverser Stone in your inventory and Dawn of Death in current quests. The starting NPC appears during the cut scene and is not a stand alone NPC. If you defeat Briareus without having the quest flagged, and then flag the quest later, you will automatically complete the quest after re-zoning.

nodes.title: Proceed to G-6, and click the ??? to pop Briareus.
nodes.description: Proceed to G-6, and click the ??? to pop Briareus. Three key items are needed to pop it, but only one person needs to have them: Dented Gigas Shield from Adamastor. Severed Gigas Collar from Grandgousier. Warped Gigas Armband from Pantagruel.

nodes.title: Defeat Briareus.
nodes.description: Defeat Briareus. It is a difficult battle, so a full alliance is recommended but not necessary. Certain jobs/job combinations are able to solo/duo the battle. All members of the alliance will receive credit for the kill. The title is received at this point.

nodes.title: Enter Abyssea - La Theine via any route for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Enter Abyssea - La Theine via any route for a cutscene.

nodes.title: Trade a Velkk Mask or Velkk Necklace to Felmsy (G-6, not far from HP #1) for your reward.
nodes.description: Trade a Velkk Mask or Velkk Necklace to Felmsy (G-6, not far from HP #1) for your reward. These can be obtained from the Auction House, from Reives in Marjami Ravine, or by defeating Velkk.

nodes.title: In the Manustery at H-9 in Windurst Woods, talk to Kororo.
nodes.description: In the Manustery at H-9 in Windurst Woods, talk to Kororo. She will say, "That spare (Insert Cardian #) there is but a newborny Cardian! So he memorizes anythingy and everythingy without reservation."

nodes.title: Talk to the Cardian that Kororo specifies.
nodes.description: Talk to the Cardian that Kororo specifies. He will ask you to give him his new greeting. Choose one, it doesn't matter which.

nodes.title: When you come back some time later (after 1 minute, and you must zone!), talk to Kororo again.
nodes.description: When you come back some time later (after 1 minute, and you must zone!), talk to Kororo again. She will tell you that the Spare Cardian you taught the greeting to would not forget it. Because you taught him the greeting, she believes you should take the responsibility for correcting it. She does not, however, know which Cardian this new Spare replaced.

nodes.title: The Cardian you are looking for is the Five of Spades.
nodes.description: The Cardian you are looking for is the Five of Spades. He is at the outpost in Buburimu Peninsula. Head out there and talk to him.

nodes.title: Then return to Kororo to tell her where you found the Cardian.
nodes.description: Then return to Kororo to tell her where you found the Cardian. She will give you a Tourmaline Earring as a reward.

nodes.title: This quest cannot be flagged if you have Windurst Mission 9-2 open.
nodes.description: This quest cannot be flagged if you have Windurst Mission 9-2 open.

nodes.title: This quest cannot be flagged if The Kind Cardian quest is flagged.
nodes.description: This quest cannot be flagged if The Kind Cardian quest is flagged.

nodes.title: Talk to Quelveuiat and agree both times, to start the quest.
nodes.description: Talk to Quelveuiat and agree both times, to start the quest. The closest home point to this NPC is home point #2. Go up the ramp and make a left. Quelveuiat will be there pacing back and forth in front of the Eonnite's Revelations.

nodes.title: Head north back across the bridge and exit the Tavnazian Safehold into Lufaise Meadows, taking the s
nodes.description: Head north back across the bridge and exit the Tavnazian Safehold into Lufaise Meadows, taking the south exit at I-6.

nodes.title: Cross over the bridge and through the pass, then head south to H-10 where you will find a lookout pl
nodes.description: Cross over the bridge and through the pass, then head south to H-10 where you will find a lookout platform.

nodes.title: Click the ??? at the top of the platform to spawn Splinterspine Grukjuk, a Ranger Orc NM.
nodes.description: Click the ??? at the top of the platform to spawn Splinterspine Grukjuk, a Ranger Orc NM.

nodes.title: Kill Splinterspine Grukjuk.
nodes.description: Kill Splinterspine Grukjuk.

nodes.title: Return to Tavnazian Safehold and talk to Quelveuiat to complete the quest.
nodes.description: Return to Tavnazian Safehold and talk to Quelveuiat to complete the quest.

nodes.title: Talk to Wahid in Bastok Markets (S) (J-9) and he will ask for an Aquamarine, a Sunstone and a Jadeit
nodes.description: Talk to Wahid in Bastok Markets (S) (J-9) and he will ask for an Aquamarine, a Sunstone and a Jadeite.

nodes.title: Trade him the stones, and you'll be prompted with a choice in CS.
nodes.description: Trade him the stones, and you'll be prompted with a choice in CS. He offers you 50,000 gil for all 3 stones. "On second thought..."

nodes.title: Whichever option you choose, you will get a CS.
nodes.description: Whichever option you choose, you will get a CS. Once the CS is over, you get all three gems back.

nodes.title: Zone out and back.
nodes.description: Zone out and back. Talk to him again.

nodes.title: Zone into North Gustaberg (S) for a small CS.
nodes.description: Zone into North Gustaberg (S) for a small CS. You must zone in directly from Bastok Markets (S); warping there will not give you the cutscene.(May have to zone more than once for proper cutscene)

nodes.title: After this, head to (J-4/J-5 line, south east corner along the wall) (near the entrance to Palboroug
nodes.description: After this, head to (J-4/J-5 line, south east corner along the wall) (near the entrance to Palborough Mines; be careful as there are goblins around J-5). Against the wall in some bushes examine the ??? for a CS. It is possible to get a different cutscene here, one that starts the quest Better Part of Valor. If so, zone back in and out of town again to get the correct one.

nodes.title: Check the ??? a second time for an Unadorned ring (Key Item).
nodes.description: Check the ??? a second time for an Unadorned ring (Key Item).

nodes.title: Return to Wahid for a CS and multiple choices: To show him the Unadorned ring or not to.
nodes.description: Return to Wahid for a CS and multiple choices: To show him the Unadorned ring or not to. To tell him the bad news or not to.

nodes.title: Zone then talk to Wahid again for a short CS and your reward.
nodes.description: Zone then talk to Wahid again for a short CS and your reward. Using Retrace counts as a zone.

nodes.title: Portaure wants you to help him smuggle some goods into Jeuno.
nodes.description: Portaure wants you to help him smuggle some goods into Jeuno. If you accept the quest, you'll obtain the temporary key item:Brugaire Goods.

nodes.title: Take the Airship to Jeuno and pass through customs.
nodes.description: Take the Airship to Jeuno and pass through customs.

nodes.title: This quest is flagged upon your first purchase of an Abyssea expansion, regardless of whether it is
nodes.description: This quest is flagged upon your first purchase of an Abyssea expansion, regardless of whether it is Vision of Abyssea, Scars of Abyssea, or Heroes of Abyssea.

nodes.title: Enter Port Jeuno on a Level 30+ job for a cutscene with Joachim.
nodes.description: Enter Port Jeuno on a Level 30+ job for a cutscene with Joachim

nodes.title: Then talk to Joachim to complete the quest.
nodes.description: Then talk to Joachim to complete the quest.

nodes.title: {Southern San d'Oria F-7} Speak with Balasiel once more to obtain Book of Tasks.
nodes.description: {Southern San d'Oria F-7} Speak with Balasiel once more to obtain Book of Tasks.

nodes.title: {Southern San d'Oria H-9} Speak with Baunise (parapet over the Westgate) to obtain Book of the West.
nodes.description: {Southern San d'Oria H-9} Speak with Baunise (parapet over the Westgate) to obtain Book of the West.

nodes.title: {Southern San d'Oria J-9} Speak with Cahaurme (parapet over the Eastgate) to obtain Book of the East
nodes.description: {Southern San d'Oria J-9} Speak with Cahaurme (parapet over the Eastgate) to obtain Book of the East.

nodes.title: {Davoi E-10} Examine the Disused Well to retrieve the Knight's Soul.
nodes.description: {Davoi E-10} Examine the Disused Well to retrieve the Knight's Soul. Travel to the broken bridge at (I-8) and drop into the water. Follow the water westbound to (D-8). Exit the water at (D-9), move southeast through the camp, and head south along the path to the Disused Well at (E-10). You will need sneak & invisible.

nodes.title: {Southern San d'Oria F-7} Return to Balasiel.
nodes.description: {Southern San d'Oria F-7} Return to Balasiel.

nodes.title: Speak with Valah Molkot at J-12 in Port Bastok, she will eventually mention something about a red fl
nodes.description: Speak with Valah Molkot at J-12 in Port Bastok, she will eventually mention something about a red flower. (Optional) Try trading her a flower, she'll accept it but says what she really wants is an Amaryllis.

nodes.title: Trade her an amaryllis and she will teach you the back alleys of Bastok, enabling you to exit to any
nodes.description: Trade her an amaryllis and she will teach you the back alleys of Bastok, enabling you to exit to any residential area within Bastok from your mog house.

nodes.title: Rolanberries can be purchased in Jeuno from Gekko or Champalpieu for 120g each.
nodes.description: Rolanberries can be purchased in Jeuno from Gekko or Champalpieu for 120g each. This equates to 17,280g for 12 stacks.

nodes.title: Examine the Cavernous Maw in Xarcabard at (H-8) after flagging Dawn of Death.
nodes.description: Examine the Cavernous Maw in Xarcabard at (H-8) after flagging Dawn of Death. You must have a Traverser Stone in your inventory to start the quest, or you will simply be allowed to enter with no cutscene. If you defeat Resheph without having the quest flagged, and then flag the quest later, you will automatically complete the quest after re-zoning.

nodes.title: Defeat the Diremite NM Resheph.
nodes.description: Defeat the Diremite NM Resheph.

nodes.title: Upon exiting the Cavernous Maw you will receive a cutscene and the quest will be completed.
nodes.description: Upon exiting the Cavernous Maw you will receive a cutscene and the quest will be completed.

nodes.title: Talk to Rotih Moalghett located at Fort Karugo-Narugo (S) (I-8, inside the fort) for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Talk to Rotih Moalghett located at Fort Karugo-Narugo (S) (I-8, inside the fort) for a cutscene.

nodes.title: Zone into Castle Oztroja (S) for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Zone into Castle Oztroja (S) for a cutscene.

nodes.title: Return to Rotih Moalghett for a second cutscene and a Fort Key.
nodes.description: Return to Rotih Moalghett for a second cutscene and a Fort Key.

nodes.title: Gather all the members of your party in the lower lefthand corner of (H-5) / (G-6) Fort Karugo-Narug
nodes.description: Gather all the members of your party in the lower lefthand corner of (H-5) / (G-6) Fort Karugo-Narugo (S) (map 2), and have your party leader click the Colorful Door to enter Ghoyu's Reverie. Everyone in the group must have a Fort Key to enter, unless they have completed the quest before. (See below for Strategies) You are placed in West Sarutabaruta (S), right outside Windurst Waters (S) after winning the battle.

nodes.title: Enter Windurst Waters (S) for a cutscene to finish the quest and receive your reward.
nodes.description: Enter Windurst Waters (S) for a cutscene to finish the quest and receive your reward. If your inventory is full and you cannot obtain the reward, speak to Romaa Mihgo at (G-11) of the northern map in Windurst Waters (S) when your inventory is no longer full.

nodes.title: If you have won this fight before, you do not need a key item to enter if you want to help.
nodes.description: If you have won this fight before, you do not need a key item to enter if you want to help.

nodes.title: Talk to the Machine Outfitter and select to help with upgrading a Martello.
nodes.description: Talk to the Machine Outfitter and select to help with upgrading a Martello

nodes.title: Go to any Martello located in the zone.
nodes.description: Go to any Martello located in the zone.

nodes.title: Examine the Martello and select the option to upgrade.
nodes.description: Examine the Martello and select the option to upgrade. You will be asked to upgrade the Martello from a specific side.

nodes.title: Examine the Martello from any side and complete the upgrade.
nodes.description: Examine the Martello from any side and complete the upgrade. After finishing the upgrade process you obtain a Cracked fuel reservoir.

nodes.title: Return to the Machine Outfitter to complete the quest.
nodes.description: Return to the Machine Outfitter to complete the quest. If for any reason you exit Abyssea - Altepa, you lose the Fuel reservoir or the Cracked fuel reservoir depending on which you have acquired. This quest or Refuel and Replenish (Altepa) can only be done once per Vana'diel day.

nodes.description: Talk to the Machine Outfitter and select to help with upgrading a Martello.

nodes.description: Go to any Martello located in the zone.

nodes.title: Examine the Martello and select the option to upgrade.
nodes.description: Examine the Martello and select the option to upgrade. You will be asked to upgrade the Martello from a specific side.

nodes.description: Examine the Martello from the specified side and select to complete the upgrade. After finishing the upgrade process, you receive a Cracked fuel reservoir.

This quest or Refuel and Replenish (Attohwa) can only be done once per Vana'diel day.

nodes.description: Talk to the Machine Outfitter and select to help with upgrading a Martello

nodes.title: Go to any Martello located in the zone.
nodes.description: Go to any Martello located in the zone.

nodes.title: Examine the Martello and select the option to upgrade.
nodes.description: Examine the Martello and select the option to upgrade. You will be asked to upgrade the Martello from the East side.

nodes.title: Examine the Martello from the East side and select to complete the upgrade.
nodes.description: Examine the Martello from the East side and select to complete the upgrade. After finishing the upgrade process you will be given a Cracked fuel reservoir key item.

nodes.title: Return to the Machine Outfitter to complete the quest.
nodes.description: Return to the Machine Outfitter to complete the quest. If for any reason you exit Abyssea - Konschtat, you will lose the Fuel reservoir or the Cracked fuel reservoir depending on which you have aquired. This quest or Refuel and Replenish (Konschtat) can only be done once per Vana'diel day.

nodes.title: On discovering a Martello you must examine it and select the option to upgrade.
nodes.description: On discovering a Martello you must examine it and select the option to upgrade. You will be asked to stand on a specific side of the Martello to upgrade it. After finishing the upgrade process you will be given a Cracked fuel reservoir, which you must then return to the Machine Outfitter to complete the quest. If for any reason you exit Abyssea - La Theine, you will lose the Fuel reservoir or the Cracked fuel reservoir depending on which you have acquired. Cruor reward is based on performance. A response of "the operation was an unqualified success" upon quest completion receives 45 cruor. This can easily be obtained by upgrading from the exact direction it tells you to when you select "Prepare to Upgrade".

nodes.title: Talk to the Machine Outfitter and select to help with upgrading a Martello.
nodes.description: Talk to the Machine Outfitter and select to help with upgrading a Martello.

nodes.title: Go to any Martello located in the zone.
nodes.description: Go to any Martello located in the zone.

nodes.title: Examine the Martello and select the option to upgrade.
nodes.description: Examine the Martello and select the option to upgrade. You will be asked to upgrade the Martello from a specific side.

nodes.description: Examine the Martello from any side and select to complete the upgrade. After finishing the upgrade process you receive a Cracked fuel reservoir.

If for any reason you exit Abyssea - Misareaux, you will lose the Fuel reservoir or the Cracked fuel reservoir, depending on which you have acquired. This quest or Refuel and Replenish (Misareaux) can only be done once per Vana'diel day.

nodes.title: Talk to the Machine Outfitter and choose "Assist with upgrades." If this option isn't available, you
nodes.description: Talk to the Machine Outfitter and choose "Assist with upgrades." If this option isn't available, you do not have enough fame or have already completed a quest from the Machine Outfitter in your current visit to Abyssea. You may have to do a few quests after getting reputation 2 before being eligible for this quest. I believe you also have to wait a game day between the previous quest and this one.

nodes.title: You will be given the Fuel reservoir key item.
nodes.description: You will be given the Fuel reservoir key item. Proceed to any martello (fuel supply doesn't matter), and choose "Upgrade the martello."

nodes.title: Choose "Upgrade from the <X direction>." The direction in this option seems never to change in a par
nodes.description: Choose "Upgrade from the <X direction>." The direction in this option seems never to change in a particular run of this quest, regardless of your actions or the direction you were told to upgrade from. It is not necessary at all to obey the direction you were told to upgrade from.

nodes.title: You will receive a Cracked fuel reservoir, with no log message.
nodes.description: You will receive a Cracked fuel reservoir, with no log message. Take that back to the Machine Outfitter to complete the quest.

nodes.title: Talk to the Machine Outfitter and select to help with upgrading a Martello.
nodes.description: Talk to the Machine Outfitter and select to help with upgrading a Martello

nodes.description: Go to any Martello located in the zone.

If for any reason you exit Abyssea - Uleguerand, you lose the Fuel reservoir or the Cracked fuel reservoir depending on which you have acquired. This quest or Refuel and Replenish (Uleguerand) can only be done once per Vana'diel day.

nodes.description: Talk to the Machine Outfitter and select to help with upgrading a Martello.

If for any reason you exit Abyssea - Vunkerl, you will lose the Fuel reservoir or the Cracked fuel reservoir, depending on which you have acquired. This quest or Refuel and Replenish (Vunkerl) can only be done once per Vana'diel day.

nodes.title: Head to Lower Jeuno and trade the Poetic Parchment (obtained from the previous quest) to Mertaire fo
nodes.description: Head to Lower Jeuno and trade the Poetic Parchment (obtained from the previous quest) to Mertaire for a cutscene.

nodes.title: Having this quest flagged signifies that you have completed the main Abyssea story.
nodes.description: Having this quest flagged signifies that you have completed the main Abyssea story. It cannot be completed.

nodes.title: Enter the Altar Room from Castle Oztroja, for a cut-scene with Hooknox to start the quest.
nodes.description: Enter the Altar Room from Castle Oztroja, for a cut-scene with Hooknox to start the quest. You will be given the option of whether or not to begin the quest; if you choose to not take the quest, you will not be given the chance to start it again until the Conquest Tally on Sunday of the following week.

nodes.title: Go to Windurst Woods, to the Weavers' Guild and talk with Ponono, the Clothcraft Guildmaster, for a
nodes.description: Go to Windurst Woods, to the Weavers' Guild and talk with Ponono, the Clothcraft Guildmaster, for a cut-scene. Ponono will need a Velvet Cloth, Rainbow Cloth, and 10,000 gil to help out.

nodes.title: Trade the requested items and gil to Ponono at the same time.
nodes.description: Trade the requested items and gil to Ponono at the same time. Zone and wait until at least the next day (after 0:00 Vana'diel time) to talk to Ponono again for a cut-scene, at which point you will receive a Yagudo Cutting item, and the recipe of the Yagudo Headgear that requires it. (Note: If you wish to receive another Yagudo Cutting, you can get more from Ponono for 100,000 gil each.)

nodes.title: The Yagudo Cutting item is used in a high skill Clothcraft recipe to craft the level 61 headwear Yag
nodes.description: The Yagudo Cutting item is used in a high skill Clothcraft recipe to craft the level 61 headwear Yagudo Headgear, which is required for the rest of the quest. Neither the Yagudo Headgear nor the Yagudo Cutting can be sold via the Auction House.

nodes.title: Return to the Altar Room while wearing the Yagudo Headgear, for another cut-scene and to receive a k
nodes.description: Return to the Altar Room while wearing the Yagudo Headgear, for another cut-scene and to receive a key item Vault Quipus.

nodes.title: Select the Stone Lid in the Altar Room while wearing the headgear.
nodes.description: Select the Stone Lid in the Altar Room while wearing the headgear. The key item will disappear and 7 angry Yagudo Notorious Monsters will arrive!

nodes.title: {Lower Jeuno G-11} Talk to Dietmund (Door:Merchant's House) in Lower Jeuno (G - 11), with Beastmaste
nodes.description: {Lower Jeuno G-11} Talk to Dietmund (Door:Merchant's House) in Lower Jeuno (G - 11), with Beastmaster as your main job. You may need to click on his door twice, make sure he mentions the Tamer's Whistle. Dietmund can be talked to at any point during this quest, and will give you optional cutscenes as reminders. From this point on, you can complete the quest on any job. Once you've flagged the quest, you don't need to be Beastmaster to finish.

nodes.title: {Upper Jeuno - Choco Stables} Take a piece of Mahogany Lumber to Osker.
nodes.description: {Upper Jeuno - Choco Stables} Take a piece of Mahogany Lumber to Osker. Obtain the Tamer's Whistle (key item) and head to Eldieme Necropolis.

nodes.title: Enter Eldieme Necropolis from Batallia Downs at F-5 ("7" entrance).
nodes.description: Enter Eldieme Necropolis from Batallia Downs at F-5 ("7" entrance). This entrance is on the upper level. You can use the Lycopodium (NPC) warp at (F-5) to move up the cliff. If you can't do that, you could take the Beaucedine Glacier Survival Guide warp (if you have it), then make your way to the exit to Batallia Downs.

nodes.title: Go to the back left sarcophagus at D-4.
nodes.description: Go to the back left sarcophagus at D-4.

nodes.title: Clear the room and click on the sarcophagus to spawn Taifun and Trombe (tigers) and Sturm (an undead
nodes.description: Clear the room and click on the sarcophagus to spawn Taifun and Trombe (tigers) and Sturm (an undead hound). Taifun and Trombe can be slept. Can be sneaked popped from the left side to avoid sight aggro from Taifun and Trombe.

nodes.title: You only need to defeat Sturm.
nodes.description: You only need to defeat Sturm. If you charmed Taifun and Trombe (recommended) they will despawn after Sturm dies.

nodes.title: Inspect the tomb again, watch a cutscene and receive your Beast Trousers.
nodes.description: Inspect the tomb again, watch a cutscene and receive your Beast Trousers. Anyone with the quest active will receive the reward upon inspecting the tomb after Sturm is defeated. (See Strategies)

nodes.title: Optional: Talk to Dietmund for an epilogue.
nodes.description: Optional: Talk to Dietmund for an epilogue.

nodes.title: Defeat all Tier IV Jeuno NMs Lancing Lamorak in West Ronfaure.
nodes.description: Defeat all Tier IV Jeuno NMs Lancing Lamorak in West Ronfaure. Rifts are at (H-6), (H-8) and (H-10). Bhishani in South Gustaberg. Rifts are at (J-10), (K-7), and (L-9). Rw Nw Prt M Hrw in East Sarutabaruta. Rifts are at (G-11), (H-6), and (J-5).

nodes.title: After defeating all 3 NMs return to an Atmacite Refiner to have your stratum abyssite upgraded to a
nodes.description: After defeating all 3 NMs return to an Atmacite Refiner to have your stratum abyssite upgraded to a White Stratum Abyssite V.

nodes.title: Defeat all Tier V Jeuno NMs.
nodes.description: Defeat all Tier V Jeuno NMs. Stachysaurus in La Theine Plateau. Rifts are at (E-5), (I-11), and (L-8). Gwynn Ap Nudd in Konschtat Highlands. Rifts are at (G-4), (I-11), and (J-8). Smierc in Tahrongi Canyon. Rifts are at (I-9), (I-12), and (J-6).

nodes.title: Speak to a present-day Voidwatch Officer for a cutscene and a Voidwatch Alarum.
nodes.description: Speak to a present-day Voidwatch Officer for a cutscene and a Voidwatch Alarum. Only Voidwatch Officers in the present give the cutscene.

nodes.title: Head to Ru'Lude Gardens and check the Door:Audience Chamber for a cutscene and 50,000 gil.
nodes.description: Head to Ru'Lude Gardens and check the Door:Audience Chamber for a cutscene and 50,000 gil. After the cutscene the quests No Rest for the Weary, VW Op. #115: Valkurm Duster, and VW Op. #118: Buburimu Squall begin automatically.

nodes.title: Talk to Merleg (Rent-A-Room Waypoint), who tells you that you cannot join his club unless you posses
nodes.description: Talk to Merleg (Rent-A-Room Waypoint), who tells you that you cannot join his club unless you possess an "aura of power."

nodes.title: Talk to Fleuricette at (D-8) (near Pioneers' Coalition waypoint), and pay her 10 bayld to obtain the

nodes.description: Nereus asks you to bring him soil from Gusgen Mines.

nodes.description: Go to I-7 (3rd map) in Gusgen Mines, near a pond, and click on the "Clay" to obtain the Gusgen Clay.

nodes.description: Note: This quest may involve both the past and present day Bastok but it will appear on your log in the list for current day Bastok.

nodes.title: Helbort needs you to make a delivery for him.
nodes.description: Helbort needs you to make a delivery for him. This quest will not be given if you haven't done the quest Father and Son. The first time you talk to Helbort, a cutscene will be shown concerning Exoroche, who is in the same store, and nothing more. Complete Father and Son, then talk to Helbort to receive this quest.

nodes.title: Take the Weapons Order to Alexius (I-6) (by the lake) in Jugner Forest who will give you a Weapons R
nodes.description: Take the Weapons Order to Alexius (I-6) (by the lake) in Jugner Forest who will give you a Weapons Receipt.

nodes.title: Return for your reward.
nodes.description: Return for your reward.

nodes.description: Speak to Luto Mewrilah in Upper Jeuno to receive a cutscene and a Magian Mooglehood missive.

nodes.title: Speak to the Orange Magian Moogle, who will give you a Tandem Necklace +3.
nodes.description: Speak to the Orange Magian Moogle, who will give you a Tandem Necklace +3.

nodes.description: Trade the Tandem Necklace +3 to the blue Magian Moogle to start Trial 4449.

nodes.description: Have your fellow perform 20 weapon skills on experience-yielding Vermin type monsters. Tandem Necklace +3 must be equipped. It is optimal to set your fellow to Fierce Attacker for this quest, and not to equip him/her with a club in order to avoid Moonlight and Starlight, which do not count for this quest.

nodes.title: Trade the Tandem Necklace +3 back to the Magian Moogle for a Dark Meed.
nodes.description: Trade the Tandem Necklace +3 back to the Magian Moogle for a Dark Meed.

nodes.title: Trade the Dark Meed to Luto Mewrilah.
nodes.description: Trade the Dark Meed to Luto Mewrilah.

nodes.description: Talk to Ayame to activate the quest.

nodes.description: Next, go to Bastok Mines and talk to Virnage at I-5 (in the Bats Lair Inn) to receive the Dawn Talisman.

nodes.title: Next head out to Oldton Movalpolos to speak with Rakorok at K-10.
nodes.description: Next head out to Oldton Movalpolos to speak with Rakorok at K-10. When you click on Rakorok, the NM Bugallug will immediately appear. Defeat Bugallug (see testimonials). Please note, the other Moblins in the area will link with Bugallug.

nodes.title: Talk to Rakorok again, and get a cutscene.
nodes.description: Talk to Rakorok again, and get a cutscene.

nodes.title: Go back to Bastok Mines and speak with Virnage again to get your reward.
nodes.description: Go back to Bastok Mines and speak with Virnage again to get your reward.

nodes.description: Talk to Etteh Sulaej at (J-9) in Kazham for a cutscene and a Letter to Angelica.

nodes.title: Take the letter to Windurst Waters and talk to Angelica at the Rarab Tail Hostelry.
nodes.description: Take the letter to Windurst Waters and talk to Angelica at the Rarab Tail Hostelry. You will receive Angelica's letter for the chieftainness and the painting "Final Fantasy" that she wants you to hang in the Temple of Uggalepih.

nodes.title: Go back to Kazham and talk to Etteh Sulaej for another cutscene.
nodes.description: Go back to Kazham and talk to Etteh Sulaej for another cutscene. You are instructed to go hang the picture yourself in the temple.

nodes.title: Go to (G-8) on the first map of the Temple of Uggalepih and hang the picture in the Stone Picture Fr
nodes.description: Go to (G-8) on the first map of the Temple of Uggalepih and hang the picture in the Stone Picture Frame on the south wall of the "Paintbrush Room". Trompe L'Oeil will appear.

nodes.title: Defeat the NM and then check the frame and to obtain a Ripped "Final Fantasy" painting.
nodes.description: Defeat the NM and then check the frame and to obtain a Ripped "Final Fantasy" painting. If more than one person in your party needs this quest, the whole party will have to zone after the fight, and pop again.

nodes.title: Return to Etteh Sulaej.
nodes.description: Return to Etteh Sulaej. As a reward, you will receive 3000 Gil. The quest is now complete.

nodes.title: Migliorozz gives you the Phoenix Pearl or Phoenix Armlet (key item), to take to Pso'Xja's southweste
nodes.description: Migliorozz gives you the Phoenix Pearl or Phoenix Armlet (key item), to take to Pso'Xja's southwestern tower.

nodes.title: Head to Beaucedine Glacier (G-9) and enter the tower; this is the tower closest to the Ranguemont Pa
nodes.description: Head to Beaucedine Glacier (G-9) and enter the tower; this is the tower closest to the Ranguemont Pass zone, and has no level cap.

nodes.title: Head up the stairs to the small room at (I-8), which contains a ???.
nodes.description: Head up the stairs to the small room at (I-8), which contains a ???.

nodes.title: This quest is flagged upon completion of Champions of Abyssea.
nodes.description: This quest is flagged upon completion of Champions of Abyssea. Joachim asks you to travel to the Hall of the Gods between dusk and dawn (18:00-5:00) to meet Gilgamesh. A note for those that didn't go speak to Gilgamesh in La Theine each time you got a Lunar Abyssite: You must first go to the ??? in La Theine and speak to Gilgamesh during night, then speak to Joachim, speak to Joachim again to get the request to go to the Hall of the Gods. Zoning is not required after final quest cutscenes with Joachim; just speak to him right away to flag the next quest.

nodes.title: Zone into the Hall of the Gods between 18:00 and 4:59 to initiate the cutscene and complete this que
nodes.description: Zone into the Hall of the Gods between 18:00 and 4:59 to initiate the cutscene and complete this quest.

nodes.title: The next quest is flagged immediately upon cutscene completion.
nodes.description: The next quest is flagged immediately upon cutscene completion.

nodes.title: Talk to Glenne; she's worried about her husband, Aaveleon, a guard out on patrol, and gives you some
nodes.description: Talk to Glenne; she's worried about her husband, Aaveleon, a guard out on patrol, and gives you some healing ointment to take to him.

nodes.title: Find him on the road to Ghelsba Outpost in West Ronfaure (G-6).
nodes.description: Find him on the road to Ghelsba Outpost in West Ronfaure (G-6).

nodes.title: Trade Ointment to him and he'll give you the Ointment Case, so you can give it back to his wife.
nodes.description: Trade Ointment to him and he'll give you the Ointment Case, so you can give it back to his wife.

nodes.title: Trade the Ointment Case to Glenne to complete the quest.
nodes.description: Trade the Ointment Case to Glenne to complete the quest.

nodes.title: Talk to Pudith after completing the previous quest to begin this quest.
nodes.description: Talk to Pudith after completing the previous quest to begin this quest.

nodes.title: Trade a jar of Umbril Ooze to Pudith to complete the quest.
nodes.description: Trade a jar of Umbril Ooze to Pudith to complete the quest. Umbril Ooze can be purchased from the Auction House under Alchemy materials, or it can be farmed from Umbrils.

nodes.title: Talk to Hariga-Origa in Windurst Waters in the west Optistery F-8; he asks you to bring items to fix
nodes.description: Talk to Hariga-Origa in Windurst Waters in the west Optistery F-8; he asks you to bring items to fix smudges in a book.

nodes.title: Obtain Slime Oil, which drops from slimes and can be bought from the Auction House.
nodes.description: Obtain Slime Oil, which drops from slimes and can be bought from the Auction House.

nodes.title: Acquire a Frost Turnip, which can be bought from the Auction House or the Valdeaunia regional mercha
nodes.description: Acquire a Frost Turnip, which can be bought from the Auction House or the Valdeaunia regional merchant, or obtained from Vegetable Seeds in Mog Garden.

nodes.title: Trade both items at the same time to Hariga-Origa for your reward.
nodes.description: Trade both items at the same time to Hariga-Origa for your reward. If you already purchased a map of Fei'Yin from a vendor, you do not receive another.

nodes.title: Optional: after completing the quest, talk to Serukoko to learn the origin of the stain.
nodes.description: Optional: after completing the quest, talk to Serukoko to learn the origin of the stain.

nodes.title: {Southern San d'Oria F-7} Talk to Balasiel.
nodes.description: {Southern San d'Oria F-7} Talk to Balasiel. Trade him Revival Tree Root to him to complete the quest. Auction House: Materials -> Alchemy Otherwise typically dropped by undead. Despite what he says, you don't have to get the Revival Root from King Ranperre's Tomb. Any Revival Root will work. Balasiel can be tricky to find. Start by going to Watchdog Alley at (F-6). You will see an NPC named Celyddon. Walk west from him into the stairwell. Follow it upward, and take your first left. do not walk out along the wooden walkway; walk across the wooden bridge instead Follow those stairs up, then they will dip back down, and curve around to Balasiel. It is not necessary to zone to give the Revival Tree Root after he gives you the quest. Give it immediately after talking to him.

nodes.title: {Southern San d'Oria F-7}Talk to Balasiel, same place as last time.
nodes.description: {Southern San d'Oria F-7}Talk to Balasiel, same place as last time. Have a form of Sneak/Invisible to avoid aggro in Ordelle's, depending on your level (sub Lv40). Consider having a form of Warp or Escape, such as a scroll of Instant Warp, for a quick out once you have the Stalactite Dew. The following steps are optional and for dialogue purposes. You can immediately head to Ordelle's Caves without talking to either Chanpau or Morjean and still complete the quest. (Southern San d'Oria E-7) Talk to Chanpau. {Northern San d'Oria L-7} Talk to Morjean in the Cathedral's Manuscript room. This step cannot be completed if you are currently between the steps of speaking with Morjean and collecting the Wyvern Egg for the Dragoon flag quest The Holy Crest. If Morjean will only say "Ah, good day. I am Morjean, a researcher here...", it doesn't hold up the quest.

nodes.title: {La Theine Plateau F-6} Enter down into the ravine.
nodes.description: {La Theine Plateau F-6} Enter down into the ravine. Once past the Equesobillot NPC, follow the left wall until you zone into Ordelle's Caves. There is a Survival Guide in Ordelle's Caves at the entrance.

nodes.title: {Ordelle's Caves Map 2 H-2} Starting here, make your way to the stalactite room.
nodes.description: {Ordelle's Caves Map 2 H-2} Starting here, make your way to the stalactite room. Get to (Map 2 G-3) and go west here. Follow this path until you circle up to "A" at (G-4) . You will transition to Map 1. (Map 1 G-4 "A") Continue down the steps until you get to the cave room at (Map 1 I-5) Take the Southwest exit and climb up toward "C" at (Map 1 G-6). (Map 2 G-6 "C") The cave room is just south at (G-7). If you instead took the uncommon entrance (La Theine Plateau at H-7) into Ordelle's: You start at the North end of Map 1: Travel to the cave room at (I-5). Take the South exit from this room. Climb the steps. You will transition to Map 2 at (H-6). Proceed to the cave room at (H-6).

nodes.title: {Ordelle's Caves Map 2 G-7} Obtain the Stalactite Dew.
nodes.description: {Ordelle's Caves Map 2 G-7} Obtain the Stalactite Dew. You should be able to see both ??? as you look into this cave room. Aggro in this room (sub Lv40) Sound = Shriekers (mushrooms), Hognosed Bats, and Jellies. Sight & Magic = Will-o'-the-Wisp (bomb) may be by the pool of water. You are timed between touching two ???. Touch the ??? that rests in the pool of water. Quickly search for the second ??? near the center of this room. If you did this correctly, you will receive key item: Stalactite Dew. If you did not receive the key item: you took too long between the??? points. Click the first ??? and try again.

nodes.title: {Southern San d'Oria F-7} Return to Balasiel for your recognition.
nodes.description: {Southern San d'Oria F-7} Return to Balasiel for your recognition. You can take A Knight's Test without having to zone after completing the quest, if the requirement has been passed.

nodes.title: Talk to Ohbiru-Dohbiru (A) at (I-7), near Conflux #7.
nodes.description: Talk to Ohbiru-Dohbiru (A) at (I-7), near Conflux #7.

nodes.title: Talk to Kenapa-Keppa (A) (I-7) east of camp to receive a Bucket of Compound Compost.
nodes.description: Talk to Kenapa-Keppa (A) (I-7) east of camp to receive a Bucket of Compound Compost.

nodes.title: Click on the Lycopodium Rootprint at (H-7) to spawn Rubicund Adenium.
nodes.description: Click on the Lycopodium Rootprint at (H-7) to spawn Rubicund Adenium. This is not a docile Mandragora/Lycopodium/Adenium as is usually the case: it will aggro you upon being spawned.

nodes.title: Kite it back to Kenapa-Keppa (A) to capture it.
nodes.description: Kite it back to Kenapa-Keppa (A) to capture it. Position the Rubicund Adenium directly in front of Kenapa-Keppa's face, and he will cast a spell on it to capture it.

nodes.title: After he has captured the monster, talk to Kenapa-Keppa to complete the quest and receive a pair of
nodes.description: After he has captured the monster, talk to Kenapa-Keppa to complete the quest and receive a pair of Dance Shoes with a random augment. Waltz potency occurs about 10% of the time (8/105). NPC Price ~7.2k

nodes.title: It is not possible to use a Marble Nugget obtained from the Auction House or from Colonization Reive
nodes.description: It is not possible to use a Marble Nugget obtained from the Auction House or from Colonization Reives for this quest.

nodes.title: Talk to Apolliane to begin the quest.
nodes.description: Talk to Apolliane to begin the quest.

nodes.title: Find a Mining Point in Morimar Basalt Fields and use a Pickaxe to mine a Marble Nugget.
nodes.description: Find a Mining Point in Morimar Basalt Fields and use a Pickaxe to mine a Marble Nugget. You can buy Pickaxes from Silent Rooster (K-10) in the Morimar Basalt Fields for 200 gil each. He is a few steps away from Apolliane. You will likely need many Pickaxes, but you can only attempt to excavate 25 times at once. You then can either zone out to reset, or wait some amount of time due to fatigue. Depending on your method, you may want multiple stacks of pickaxes. Known Mining Points include J-10, J-11, I-9, H-5, J-6, J-7, I-7, F-10, and F-8. You cannot trade her a Marble Nugget that you've obtained any other way besides mining it yourself. This includes Marble Nuggets which were mined on another character on the same account.

nodes.title: Trade Apolliane a Marble Nugget you excavated in Morimar Basalt Fields to learn "Demolishing" and re
nodes.description: Trade Apolliane a Marble Nugget you excavated in Morimar Basalt Fields to learn "Demolishing" and receive 500 bayld.

nodes.title: This quest is flagged and completed in the same way as The Rider Cometh and Unwavering Resolve, and
nodes.description: This quest is flagged and completed in the same way as The Rider Cometh and Unwavering Resolve, and has the same rewards for completion. The only difference from previous completions is new, unchanging dialogue from Odin, Nashmeira, Ovjang and Mnejing after completion, and the removal of the dialogue selection where you may ask for the release of Odin's knight, among other boons.

nodes.title: Talk to Antreneau, he complains that he's had naught to eat but beans lately, and they just do not s
nodes.description: Talk to Antreneau, he complains that he's had naught to eat but beans lately, and they just do not satisfy. The cook, Thierride, wishes he could make him some meat, but is fresh out.

nodes.title: Speak with Thierride and he will ask you to get him 5 slices of Hare Meat.
nodes.description: Speak with Thierride and he will ask you to get him 5 slices of Hare Meat.

nodes.title: Obtain 5 slices of Hare Meat and trade them to Thierride to complete the quest.
nodes.description: Obtain 5 slices of Hare Meat and trade them to Thierride to complete the quest.

nodes.title: Talk to Antreneau again to get a sample slice of Grilled Hare.
nodes.description: Talk to Antreneau again to get a sample slice of Grilled Hare.

nodes.title: Originally, you needed to wait until after JP midnight to proceed.
nodes.description: Originally, you needed to wait until after JP midnight to proceed. You no longer need to wait for JP midnight. You *may* have to wait for the next Vana'diel day.

nodes.title: Talk to Qutiba (K-12) in the Shararat Teahouse for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Talk to Qutiba (K-12) in the Shararat Teahouse for a cutscene. If you talk with Ulamaal, you will get a bonus random recipe. You can do it before talking to Qutiba, before you trade the White Honey, or after you get the Irmik Helvasi. Pretty much anytime during the quest. You may have to talk to Qutiba several times, and agree to listen to a recipe, before the cutscene plays.

nodes.title: Trade Qutiba three pots of White Honey for another cutscene, an Irmik Helvasi and the recipe to make
nodes.description: Trade Qutiba three pots of White Honey for another cutscene, an Irmik Helvasi and the recipe to make it. You may trade more White Honey if you forget the Irmik Helvasi recipe; you may get an additional food recipe also.

nodes.title: Note: The completed quest is listed in your "Completed Quests" log before the first quest in this qu
nodes.description: Note: The completed quest is listed in your "Completed Quests" log before the first quest in this quest chain .

nodes.title: If you just finished Love and Ice, you must zone before you can start this quest.
nodes.description: If you just finished Love and Ice, you must zone before you can start this quest.

nodes.title: Talk to Carmelo and watch the cut-scene to start the quest.
nodes.description: Talk to Carmelo and watch the cut-scene to start the quest.

nodes.description: Obtain three Key Items from Treasure Chests (not coffers) in three different zones:

nodes.description: Head to Norg and speak with Jaucribaix (K-8) for a cutscene.

nodes.description: Talk to Roskin (H-8) in Eastern Adoulin for a cutscene and an Imprint device S.

nodes.description: Talk to Polished Pebble (J-10) in the Inventors' Coalition in Western Adoulin for a cutscene.

nodes.title: Return to Roskin for a cutscene with Margret and Palomel.
nodes.description: Return to Roskin for a cutscene with Margret and Palomel.

nodes.title: Travel to Yorcia Weald (I-10) Bivouac #2 and check the Well-Kept Cache for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Travel to Yorcia Weald (I-10) Bivouac #2 and check the Well-Kept Cache for a cutscene.

nodes.title: Check it again to fight Inquisitor Mortuus and obtain a Weathered Haverton hat.
nodes.description: Check it again to fight Inquisitor Mortuus and obtain a Weathered Haverton hat.

nodes.title: Check it again after the fight for a cutscene with Balamor, Oston, Lola, and Palomel, as well as a F
nodes.description: Check it again after the fight for a cutscene with Balamor, Oston, Lola, and Palomel, as well as a Forgotten Memory.

nodes.title: Zone into Eastern Adoulin for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Zone into Eastern Adoulin for a cutscene.

nodes.title: Talk to Roskin.
nodes.description: Talk to Roskin.

nodes.title: Talk to Palomel (G-9) for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Talk to Palomel (G-9) for a cutscene.

nodes.title: Talk to Roskin for a cutscene and your reward.
nodes.description: Talk to Roskin for a cutscene and your reward. At any time, you may trade the Erudition Necklace to Roskin for 30,000 bayld. At any time, you may trade a Frontier Soda and 30,000 bayld to Roskin for the Erudition Necklace.

nodes.title: Optional: Talk to Wegellion (F-9) in the Scouts' Coalition to trade the Weathered Haverton hat for 1
nodes.description: Optional: Talk to Wegellion (F-9) in the Scouts' Coalition to trade the Weathered Haverton hat for 10,000 EXP/Limit Points and 3 High-purity Bayld.

nodes.title: Speak with Roskin to activate quest and receive Elder wooden box.
nodes.description: Speak with Roskin to activate quest and receive Elder wooden box. Roskin will ask you a series of questions. You should accept the first answer in the list, as other answers can / will terminate the activation sequence.

nodes.title: Travel to (G-9) Eastern Adoulin and speak with Palomel to receive Imprint device S.
nodes.description: Travel to (G-9) Eastern Adoulin and speak with Palomel to receive Imprint device S.

nodes.title: Travel to (G-8) Rabao and speak with Quwi Orihbhe for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Travel to (G-8) Rabao and speak with Quwi Orihbhe for a cutscene.

nodes.title: Optional: Return to Roskin who informs you to use the device in various locales.
nodes.description: Optional: Return to Roskin who informs you to use the device in various locales.

nodes.title: Talk to Roskin at Eastern Adoulin (H-8).
nodes.description: Talk to Roskin at Eastern Adoulin (H-8).

nodes.title: Trade a Frontier Soda to Roskin.
nodes.description: Trade a Frontier Soda to Roskin. Frontier Soda can be obtained from Bernegeois at (G-8) in Eastern Adoulin for 125 gil.

nodes.title: Talk to Roskin (H-8) in Eastern Adoulin.
nodes.description: Talk to Roskin (H-8) in Eastern Adoulin.

nodes.title: Trade Ulbuconut Milk to Roskin.
nodes.description: Trade Ulbuconut Milk to Roskin. Ulbuconut Milk +1 will also work. Ulbuconut Milk can be obtained through crafting, the Auction House, or from Bernegeois if you have completed Cafe...teria this Conquest Tally.

nodes.title: Speak with Deraquien for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Speak with Deraquien for a cutscene.

nodes.title: Go to La Theine Plateau and speak with Narvecaint (F-7) at the entrance to Ordelle's Caves for anoth
nodes.description: Go to La Theine Plateau and speak with Narvecaint (F-7) at the entrance to Ordelle's Caves for another cutscene. If you have the Survival Guide for Ordelle's Caves flagged, teleport to it and then zone out to La Theine Plateau -- this is by far the quickest way to get to Narvecaint.

nodes.title: Return to Southern San d'Oria (to save some time, use the Survival Guide in Ordelle's Caves to telep
nodes.description: Return to Southern San d'Oria (to save some time, use the Survival Guide in Ordelle's Caves to teleport back to San d'Oria) and speak with Deraquien again. You are then told to go to Chateau d'Oraguille to speak with Halver--he'll be right in front of you. You must be on or finished either San d'Oria: Mission 1-3, Bastok: Mission 2-3 or Windurst: Mission 2-3 depending on your citizenship in order to enter Chateau d'Oraguille.

nodes.title: Return back to talk to Deraquien and then go to the first house on the left after the Tanner's Guild
nodes.description: Return back to talk to Deraquien and then go to the first house on the left after the Tanner's Guild and talk to Phillone (D-7).

nodes.title: Go back to speak with Deraquien.
nodes.description: Go back to speak with Deraquien.

nodes.title: Head to King Ranperre's Tomb.
nodes.description: Head to King Ranperre's Tomb.

nodes.title: Go to Jugner Forest through King Ranperre's Tomb.
nodes.description: Go to Jugner Forest through King Ranperre's Tomb. Once you get there, wait until between 18:00 and 6:00, then click on the ??? right outside (F-5). This spawns two NMs, Giollemitte B Feroun and Skeleton Esquire (see testimonials). Only Giollemitte B Feroun needs to be defeated - Sneak can be used to pop them aggro free. Its possible Skeleton Esquire may need to depop before killing Giollemitte B Feroun ,as no cutscene was received after checking the ??? when the skeleton depoped after killing the Fomor. Rezoning and killing both gave the cutscene.

nodes.title: After you kill them, click on the ??? again for a cutscene.
nodes.description: After you kill them, click on the ??? again for a cutscene.

nodes.title: Return to Phillone for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Return to Phillone for a cutscene.

nodes.title: Travel back to La Theine Plateau and speak with Narvecaint again.
nodes.description: Travel back to La Theine Plateau and speak with Narvecaint again.

nodes.title: Return one last time to Southern San d'Oria to speak with Phillone to receive your reward.
nodes.description: Return one last time to Southern San d'Oria to speak with Phillone to receive your reward.

nodes.title: Speak to Luto Mewrilah in Upper Jeuno to receive a cutscene and a Magian Mooglehood missive.
nodes.description: Speak to Luto Mewrilah in Upper Jeuno to receive a cutscene and a Magian Mooglehood missive.

nodes.title: Speak with the orange Magian Moogle in Ru'Lude Gardens to receive a Tandem Necklace.
nodes.description: Speak with the orange Magian Moogle in Ru'Lude Gardens to receive a Tandem Necklace.

nodes.title: Trade the Tandem Necklace to the blue Magian Moogle to start Trial 4444.
nodes.description: Trade the Tandem Necklace to the blue Magian Moogle to start Trial 4444. Defeat 30 experience-yielding monsters with your Adventuring Fellow to complete the Trial. Tandem Necklace must be equipped when the monster dies. Your Adventuring Fellow must receive experience points from the kill.

nodes.title: After completing Trial 4444's objectives, trade the Tandem Necklace to the blue Magian Moogle to rec
nodes.description: After completing Trial 4444's objectives, trade the Tandem Necklace to the blue Magian Moogle to receive a Copper Meed.

nodes.title: Return to Upper Jeuno and trade the Copper Meed to Luto Mewrilah to complete the quest.
nodes.description: Return to Upper Jeuno and trade the Copper Meed to Luto Mewrilah to complete the quest.

nodes.description: Speak to the Orange Magian Moogle, who will give you a Tandem Necklace +4 and a key item.

nodes.description: Trade the Tandem Necklace +4 to the blue Magian Moogle to start Trial 5054.

nodes.description: Have your fellow perform 30 Weapon Skills on experience-yielding undead type monsters. Tandem Necklace +4 must be equipped. Ensure your fellow is not equipped with a club, because Moonlight and Starlight do not count for this trial.

nodes.title: Trade the Tandem Necklace +4 back to the Magian Moogle for a Gold Meed.
nodes.description: Trade the Tandem Necklace +4 back to the Magian Moogle for a Gold Meed.

nodes.description: Trade the Gold Meed and 20 Kindred's Crests to Luto Mewrilah.

nodes.title: After finishing this this quest, you must fight alongside your fellow as usual to raise his/her leve
nodes.description: After finishing this this quest, you must fight alongside your fellow as usual to raise his/her level to 99.

nodes.description: Speak to Luto Mewrilah in Upper Jeuno to receive a cutscene and a Magian Mooglehood missive.

Tandem Necklace +1 must be equipped when the bird dies. Your Adventuring Fellow must receive experience points from the kill.

nodes.description: After completing Trial 4445's objectives, trade the Tandem Necklace +1 to the blue Magian Moogle to receive a Silver Meed.

nodes.title: Return to Upper Jeuno and trade the Silver Meed to Luto Mewrilah to complete the quest.
nodes.description: Return to Upper Jeuno and trade the Silver Meed to Luto Mewrilah to complete the quest.

nodes.title: Talk to Belgidiveau (A); he will ask you to obtain a body part from an Abyssean creature.
nodes.description: Talk to Belgidiveau (A); he will ask you to obtain a body part from an Abyssean creature. Not all body parts will work. Most are Tier 1 pop items that drop from ordinary monsters in Abyssea. None of the parts dropped from NMs to use in magian trials (e.g. Bakka's Wing) work. Refer to the lists below (update if more are found).

nodes.title: Trade the item to Belgidiveau (A) for your reward.
nodes.description: Trade the item to Belgidiveau (A) for your reward.

nodes.title: You do not need to zone to repeat this quest.
nodes.description: You do not need to zone to repeat this quest. However, you must speak with him again after each trade to reactivate the quest, and he will only accept one item each time.

nodes.title: Trading 13 "high strength" items gives you enough fame for the Crimson Abyssite of Celerity quest fr
