You can talk to Curilla again after obtaining Curilla's Alter Ego or pass through the dialogue for it. The General's Secret quest also prioritizes over this weapon skill quest and must start it first to get the weapon skill quest dialogue.

nodes.title: Use the Sapara of Trials until the latent effect disappears.
nodes.description: Use the Sapara of Trials until the latent effect disappears. (This does not always disappear. Check with Quest Giver NPC periodically by trading her the sword to see your status.)

missions.title: Over the Hills and Far Away

nodes.title: To activate this quest, first go to the second floor of the house at (G-7) in Southern San d'Oria.
nodes.description: To activate this quest, first go to the second floor of the house at (G-7) in Southern San d'Oria.

nodes.title: Read the diary there a couple of times until you have read Page 4.
nodes.description: Read the diary there a couple of times until you have read Page 4. Pages 2 and 3 of the diary refer to the quests A Squire's Test II and The Medicine Woman, which do not need to be completed to get to the page 4, unless they have been activated. See the Discussion page for details and testimonials.

nodes.title: Talk to Antreneau in the Rusty Anchor Pub in Port San d'Oria.
nodes.description: Talk to Antreneau in the Rusty Anchor Pub in Port San d'Oria. The quest A Taste For Meat might interfere with Antreneau speaking about Uleguerand Range. Complete A Taste For Meat and restart the walkthrough starting with reading the Diary at (G-7) in Southern San d'Oria. If Antreneau continues to say, "All right, then! I am ready to eat!" you do not have sufficient Reputation to participate in this quest. Although previously listed as having a reputation requirement of 9, it has since been confirmed that the quest can be flagged by having a San d'Oria reputation of 8.

nodes.title: He will tell you that the Map of the Uleguerand Range is top secret and his uncle has gone there to
nodes.description: He will tell you that the Map of the Uleguerand Range is top secret and his uncle has gone there to investigate the mountains. He asks you to find his uncle and tell him he wishes him back soon.

nodes.title: Now you have the quest, but first you need a Moblin Hotrok.
nodes.description: Now you have the quest, but first you need a Moblin Hotrok. Moblin Hotroks are dropped by the Moblin Ashman in Oldton Movalpolos and Moblin Groundman in Newton Movalpolos . There is a Moblin Ashman spawn at (K-10) in the "pit" area at the center of the platforms.

nodes.title: After obtaining the Moblin Hotrok, go to Uleguerand Range.
nodes.description: After obtaining the Moblin Hotrok, go to Uleguerand Range.

nodes.title: You will need to find a ??? in the caves at around (F-8), but it cannot be reached directly from the
nodes.description: You will need to find a ??? in the caves at around (F-8), but it cannot be reached directly from the entrance. Once in Uleguerand Range, you'll need to make your way counter-clockwise across the zone, slowly climbing to the top of the Thousandfall Ridge. Do not jump down holes on the way. Use sneak and invisible. Avoid Brontotaurs, Tyrannotaurs and Molechs, which are true sight. Avoid Jormungand, a HNM which spawns in your path and also has true sight.

nodes.title: Once you are at the top, start walking towards (F-8) and you will see two slopes.
nodes.description: Once you are at the top, start walking towards (F-8) and you will see two slopes. One to the south and one to the west.

nodes.title: If you slide down the southern slope, you need to land on a small ledge leading to cave S3 on the ma
nodes.description: If you slide down the southern slope, you need to land on a small ledge leading to cave S3 on the map of the Southern Slope to the right.

nodes.title: If you slide down the western slope, you need to land on a small ledge leading to cave W2 on the map
nodes.description: If you slide down the western slope, you need to land on a small ledge leading to cave W2 on the map of the Western Slope to the right. If you fall into one of the holes on the slopes (S1 or W1), you must go back onto the slope and land on the proper ledge. Once you start down a slope, you're committed. You can steer a little to the left and right and you can slow your descent by running against gravity. If you miss the outcropped cave ledge, you will have to climb back up the entire mountain. It is possible to have Tractor cast on you to put you on the ledge should you miss. S1 and W1 lead to the black tunnel path which can be seen in the cave insert on the Uleguerand Range map to the right. Caves S2 and W3 lead to the white path. The ledges you seek (S3 or W2) lead to the red path and the ???.

nodes.title: When you reach either S3 or W2, follow the path to the ???.
nodes.description: When you reach either S3 or W2, follow the path to the ???. There is also a hole above W3 that's leads to the W2 path. There is an eye at the bottom of the hole so sneak or silent oil is recommended before going down.

nodes.title: Trade in the Moblin Hotrok for a cutscene and to complete the quest.
nodes.description: Trade in the Moblin Hotrok for a cutscene and to complete the quest. You will receive a different reward if you already have bought a Map of the Uleguerand Range. This is also reflected in the dialogue, which will mention "a reward" rather than the map explicitly.

nodes.title: As a Red Mage, go to Curilla in Chateau d'Oraguille.
nodes.description: As a Red Mage, go to Curilla in Chateau d'Oraguille. Note: You don't have to be RDM for the remainder of this quest.

nodes.title: Go to Sharzalion located in the Lion Springs Tavern (K-5)/(K-6) Southern San d'Oria (near the Mog Ho
nodes.description: Go to Sharzalion located in the Lion Springs Tavern (K-5)/(K-6) Southern San d'Oria (near the Mog House).

nodes.title: Head to Fei'Yin in the Beaucedine Glacier.
nodes.description: Head to Fei'Yin in the Beaucedine Glacier.

nodes.title: Defeat Miser Murphy.
nodes.description: Defeat Miser Murphy. He spawns near the Dry Fountain at (H-8) on the first floor. He is a ghost NM with an occasional additional effect of drain on his regular melee attacks. This drain can do upwards of 600 damage to a player, restoring the NM's HP in the process. Miser Murphy cannot be bound easily. This can be a very hard fight. Possible to solo as a 75 NIN/DNC by keeping your shadows up as much as possible; you may also bring a healer to be safe.

nodes.title: When he is killed, Miser Murphy drops one Antique Coin.
nodes.description: When he is killed, Miser Murphy drops one Antique Coin.

nodes.title: Trade the Antique Coin to the Dry Fountain for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Trade the Antique Coin to the Dry Fountain for a cutscene.

nodes.title: Return to Southern San d'Oria and speak to Sharzalion in the Lion Springs Tavern.
nodes.description: Return to Southern San d'Oria and speak to Sharzalion in the Lion Springs Tavern.

nodes.title: Next, speak with Daggao (the Galka down by the stage to the right).
nodes.description: Next, speak with Daggao (the Galka down by the stage to the right).

nodes.title: Head to Garlaige Citadel.
nodes.description: Head to Garlaige Citadel. Immediately past the Banishing Gate #1 there is an Oaken Box in the first room to the left. Select this box to spawn a Guardian Statue. Guardian Statue is no slouch. He constantly spams TP Moves that can be heavy hitting or an AOE move that can inflict slow. Some can sleep you for a long duration. At level 60 with 5 trusts, this was a close fight. Note: If you wish to avoid the four-player switch for Banishing Gate #1, use a Pouch of weighted stones to open the doors solo.

nodes.title: Once defeated, the Guardian Statue drops a Nail Puller.
nodes.description: Once defeated, the Guardian Statue drops a Nail Puller.

nodes.title: Trade the Nail Puller to the Oaken Box for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Trade the Nail Puller to the Oaken Box for a cutscene. Note: Like his counterpart Miser Murphy, Guardian Statue only drops one Nail Puller at a time. Note: You do not have to be Red Mage to get the cutscene or to spawn Guardian Statue. Note: Zoning out of Garlaige Citadel after receiving the Nail Puller, but prior to trading it to the Oaken Box, resets the pop conditions for the Guardian Statue. Reexamination of the Oaken Box (even with the Nail Puller item in inventory) causes the Guardian Statue to respawn and attack. If you zone out prior to getting the CS with Rainemard, trade the Nail Puller without examining the box. (see discussion)

nodes.title: Enter Northern San d'Oria for the final cutscene and your Warlock's Chapeau.
nodes.description: Enter Northern San d'Oria for the final cutscene and your Warlock's Chapeau. Zoning from your Mog House may not trigger the cutscene. If this happens, zone from Southern San d'Oria to trigger the final cutscene. However, zoning from the Airship, using Thrifty Transit, Home Point, Survival Guide or Repatriation have worked, as has zoning into the MH in Port San d'Oria, and then zoning out of the MH into Northern San d'Oria.

nodes.title: Make sure you are a White Mage to begin.
nodes.description: Make sure you are a White Mage to begin.

nodes.title: Check the door marked "Prince Regent's Rm", located on south side of the small courtyard at (H-8) in
nodes.description: Check the door marked "Prince Regent's Rm", located on south side of the small courtyard at (H-8) in Chateau d'Oraguille. You will be asked to obtain a Tavnazia Bell. You do not need to be on White Mage for the rest of this quest in either Eldieme Necropolis or Fei'Yin, including the upcoming battle.

nodes.title: Kill Dark Stalkers in the Eldieme Necropolis until one drops a Tavnazia Bell.
nodes.description: Kill Dark Stalkers in the Eldieme Necropolis until one drops a Tavnazia Bell. The Dark Stalkers can be found after dropping down A onto the second map, they are around the Hume Bones. Four Dark Stalkers can also be found on the first map, two in the north room and two in the far west room. You can open the gates using a Magicked astrolabe obtained for 10,000 gil from Churano-Shurano, on the roof, in Windurst Waters (F-8) North map Home Point #1.

nodes.title: Start this quest by checking the door marked "Prince Regent's Rm", which is on the south side of the
nodes.description: Start this quest by checking the door marked "Prince Regent's Rm", which is on the south side of the small courtyard located at (H-8) in Chateau d'Oraguille. You will be asked to obtain the Yagudo Holy Water and a pair of Moccasins.

nodes.title: Speak with Rosel and you will get a cutscene.
nodes.description: Speak with Rosel and you will get a cutscene. Rosel has finished a cape for one of the Princes, and someone comes to pick it up. In the confusion, Rosel forgets to give the man his receipt. He asks you to deliver the Receipt for the Prince (key item) for him.

nodes.title: In this quest the receipt is for one of the San d'Orian Princes, either Trion or Pieuje.
nodes.description: In this quest the receipt is for one of the San d'Orian Princes, either Trion or Pieuje. Remember which prince it is, for you get a lesser reward for delivering to the incorrect person.

nodes.title: Go to Northern San d'Oria and talk to Guilerme who is stationed in front of the Chateau d'Oraguille
nodes.description: Go to Northern San d'Oria and talk to Guilerme who is stationed in front of the Chateau d'Oraguille at I-7. He will ask you who to give the receipt to, and will deliver it for you. The guard comes back out, insults your clothing, and sends you on your way.

nodes.title: Return to Rosel for your reward.
nodes.description: Return to Rosel for your reward.

nodes.title: Complete the Father and Son quest and make sure to give the Willow Fishing Rod back to the son.
nodes.description: Complete the Father and Son quest and make sure to give the Willow Fishing Rod back to the son. There is no need to zone if you've just completed Father and Son.

nodes.title: Talk to Ailbeche again who will ask you for an Ordelle Whetstone.
nodes.description: Talk to Ailbeche again who will ask you for an Ordelle Whetstone.

nodes.title: Talk to Sobane in (D-6) of Southern San d'Oria.
nodes.description: Talk to Sobane in (D-6) of Southern San d'Oria. Be sure to talk to her twice if you get a cutscene the first time. The cutscene is the beginning of either the quest Signed in Blood or Tea with a Tonberry? and not part of this quest.

nodes.title: Talk to Sobane, she is willing to give you a quest, but she needs to be able to trust that you'll ke
nodes.description: Talk to Sobane, she is willing to give you a quest, but she needs to be able to trust that you'll keep your mouth shut. She wants you to retrieve a Cathedral Tapestry.

nodes.title: Obtain a Cathedral Tapestry by killing Orcish Fighters in Fort Ghelsba or the Yughott Grotto.
nodes.description: Obtain a Cathedral Tapestry by killing Orcish Fighters in Fort Ghelsba or the Yughott Grotto.

nodes.title: Trade the tapestry to Sobane and she'll explain the next step.
nodes.description: Trade the tapestry to Sobane and she'll explain the next step.

nodes.title: Travel to Selbina, where you will find that the person you are looking for is nowhere to be found.
nodes.description: Travel to Selbina, where you will find that the person you are looking for is nowhere to be found. Talk to the mayor, Abelard, @ G-9 and he'll say he has "no idea" what you're talking about... but he will then mention something about a diary he found, and that some key pages are missing... perhaps his lips will loosen if you help him find them.

nodes.title: Travel to Ordelle's Caves and hunt for an Ordelle Chest Key.
nodes.description: Travel to Ordelle's Caves and hunt for an Ordelle Chest Key. Once you find a key, look for a Treasure Chest and open it. Only people who have this quest flagged will receive some Torn-Out Pages (key item). Thief can open chest and receive key item using Thief's Tools, Skeleton Key or Living Key . This key item takes precedence over the Magical Pattern from The Goblin Tailor RSE quest; if both are active, a character opening the chest will receive this key item first.

nodes.title: Return to Selbina and talk to the mayor.
nodes.description: Return to Selbina and talk to the mayor. He'll reveal some information to you which will prove interesting to Sobane.

nodes.title: Return to Sobane to complete this quest and to receive your reward.
nodes.description: Return to Sobane to complete this quest and to receive your reward.

nodes.title: Speak with Paouala (M-8), who is located in the southernmost of the three houses there, on the secon
nodes.description: Speak with Paouala (M-8), who is located in the southernmost of the three houses there, on the second floor.

nodes.title: She will say that she has heard that drinking jugs of Mary's Milk would help with her insomnia, and
nodes.description: She will say that she has heard that drinking jugs of Mary's Milk would help with her insomnia, and asks if you could bring her one. Mary's Milk can be found at the Auction House, or by defeating the NM Stray Mary in Konschtat Highlands (100% drop rate). Can also get this from your pet Lamb or Sheep in your Mog Garden.

nodes.title: Trade her one for your reward.
nodes.description: Trade her one for your reward.

nodes.title: Note: You must zone after completing the previous quest in the line Healing the Land to flag this qu
nodes.description: Note: You must zone after completing the previous quest in the line Healing the Land to flag this quest.

nodes.title: Talk to Eperdur who is located at 2nd floor of the Cathedral in Northern San d'Oria to start the que
nodes.description: Talk to Eperdur who is located at 2nd floor of the Cathedral in Northern San d'Oria to start the quest.

nodes.title: (Bostaunieux Oubliette G-7) Talk to Novalmauge in the hallway.
nodes.description: (Bostaunieux Oubliette G-7) Talk to Novalmauge in the hallway. He gives you the Scythe of Trials and a Weapon Training Guide. Trading the weapon back gives the option to cancel the quest.

nodes.title: Use the Scythe of Trials until the latent effect disappears.
nodes.description: Use the Scythe of Trials until the latent effect disappears. To remove the latent effect, you must perform Weapon Skills and Skillchains on monsters that check Easy Prey or higher to accumulate 300 Weapon Skill Points. You receive 5 points for opening/soloing a weaponskill, 7 points for closing a Lv.1 Skillchain, 9 points for closing a Lv.2 Skillchain and 11 points for closing a level 3 Skillchain. To check to see if the latent effect has disappeared, see if you do not get the elemental resistance bonuses. If not, you are done. 'Note' the latent effect itself will not disappear, only the bonuses it gives will. You do NOT have to un-equip/re-equip the weapon to check for changes in the elemental resistance bonuses. You cannot earn points towards unlocking the weapon by participating in Campaign Battles, but points can be earned while in Level Sync. Points can be earned from Reives.

nodes.title: (Bostaunieux Oubliette F-8/H-8) Give the latentless Scythe of Trials back to Novalmauge in He will g
nodes.description: (Bostaunieux Oubliette F-8/H-8) Give the latentless Scythe of Trials back to Novalmauge in He will give you a Map to the Annals of Truth. He tells you to head to the Den of Rancor. Fastest way is to take Den of Rancor Home Point #2.

nodes.title: (Den of Rancor Map 2 I-13) Click the ??? to spawn the NM Mokumokuren.
nodes.description: (Den of Rancor Map 2 I-13) Click the ??? to spawn the NM Mokumokuren. Once the NM is dead, reexamine the ??? to obtain the Annals of Truth.

nodes.title: (Bostaunieux Oubliette F-8/H-8) Bring this back to Novalmauge for your reward.
nodes.description: (Bostaunieux Oubliette F-8/H-8) Bring this back to Novalmauge for your reward.

nodes.title: Talk to Rouva at (I-8) in Southern San d'Oria to start the quest.
nodes.description: Talk to Rouva at (I-8) in Southern San d'Oria to start the quest.

nodes.title: Optional: Activate the Records of Eminence objective Miratete 1 or Miratete 1 (W) under 15th Vana've
nodes.description: Optional: Activate the Records of Eminence objective Miratete 1 or Miratete 1 (W) under 15th Vana'versary IV to get additional rewards for completing this quest.

nodes.title: Obtain Rivernewort from a ??? in either Riverne - Site #A01 or Riverne - Site #B01.
nodes.description: Obtain Rivernewort from a ??? in either Riverne - Site #A01 or Riverne - Site #B01. In Riverne - Site #A01 the ??? is found at (E-8) on the island that connects to Monarch Linn. You need two Giant Scales to get there. In Riverne - Site #B01 the ??? is found in (E-7) near the Spatial Displacement heading south toward Monarch Linn. You need one Giant Scale to get there. Alternatively you can use the Riverne - Site #B01 waypoint. Also Riverne - Site B01 Home Point #1 is at the zone to Monarch Linn. It is one displacement away from the island where the ??? is. Neither ??? ever despawns, allowing any number of players to grab the key item with no wait.

nodes.title: Return to Rouva with the Rivernewort for your reward.
nodes.description: Return to Rouva with the Rivernewort for your reward.

nodes.title: Consider completing Uninvited Guests at the same time; both ??? are found on the way to the battle f
nodes.description: Consider completing Uninvited Guests at the same time; both ??? are found on the way to the battle for that quest.

nodes.title: Legata wants 4 flint stones; trade these to her for a reward.
nodes.description: Legata wants 4 flint stones; trade these to her for a reward.

nodes.title: The 15-minute limitation of A Flash in the Pan does not apply.
nodes.description: The 15-minute limitation of A Flash in the Pan does not apply. Consecutive trades can be made.

nodes.title: If you just completed Signed in Blood, you must Zone out and back into Southern San d'Oria to flag t
nodes.description: If you just completed Signed in Blood, you must Zone out and back into Southern San d'Oria to flag this quest.

nodes.title: Talk to Sobane.
nodes.description: Talk to Sobane. She and her husband need your help confirming a threat to a local aristocrat, but the only ones who may know about it are the tight lipped Tonberries in Carpenters' Landing.

nodes.title: Travel to Attohwa Chasm and defeat Gallinipper, Ogrefly, or Monarch Ogrefly until they drop Attohwa
nodes.description: Travel to Attohwa Chasm and defeat Gallinipper, Ogrefly, or Monarch Ogrefly until they drop Attohwa Ginseng.

nodes.title: Travel to South Landing in Carpenters' Landing.
nodes.description: Travel to South Landing in Carpenters' Landing. Either take the barge from the entrance in Northern San d'Oria, or take a chocobo to the entrance at (J-8) in Jugner Forest. Or Survival Guide / Norvallen / Carpenters' Landing.

nodes.title: Talk with the elvaan Anguenet standing next to the Tonberry at the docks for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Talk with the elvaan Anguenet standing next to the Tonberry at the docks for a cutscene. He knows a way to speak with them, but he won't do it for free.

nodes.title: Trade Anguenet the Attohwa Ginseng and he will give you the Tonberry Blackboard which will allow you
nodes.description: Trade Anguenet the Attohwa Ginseng and he will give you the Tonberry Blackboard which will allow you to communicate with the Tonberry Riche on the ferry.

nodes.title: Purchase a Barge Ticket or Barge Multi-ticket and board a barge headed for Central Landing via Emfea
nodes.description: Purchase a Barge Ticket or Barge Multi-ticket and board a barge headed for Central Landing via Emfea Way. See here for the barge Schedule.

nodes.title: Talk to Riche, the Tonberry on board.
nodes.description: Talk to Riche, the Tonberry on board. Ask him all the questions (5); at the end he'll take the key item. Be sure to do this before the ride is over, which is approximately 7 minutes.

nodes.title: Travel to Fei'Yin and kill Shadow until they drop Treasury Gold.
nodes.description: Travel to Fei'Yin and kill Shadow until they drop Treasury Gold. Shadow appear on Map #1. Home Point #1 is the best warp option.

nodes.title: Take the Treasury Gold to Davoi and trade it to the ??? at (J-11), which spawns a Hematic Cyst NM.
nodes.description: Take the Treasury Gold to Davoi and trade it to the ??? at (J-11), which spawns a Hematic Cyst NM.

nodes.title: Kill the Hematic Cyst and select the ??? again for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Kill the Hematic Cyst and select the ??? again for a cutscene.

nodes.title: Fontoumant needs you to deliver some packages for him.
nodes.description: Fontoumant needs you to deliver some packages for him. The packages are given one at a time and take a slot of inventory. All deliveries are in Port San d'Oria.

nodes.title: Trade each parcel to the following NPCs: The Magic Shop Parcel is for Regine (J-8) {In Regine's Magi
nodes.description: Trade each parcel to the following NPCs: The Magic Shop Parcel is for Regine (J-8) {In Regine's Magic Mart} The Auction Parcel is for Apstaule (H-10) {Top of the Auction House} The Pub Parcel is for Thierride (G-7) {Rusty Anchor Pub}

nodes.title: Return to Fontoumant after you deliver each package to receive the next one.
nodes.description: Return to Fontoumant after you deliver each package to receive the next one.

nodes.title: After you deliver the last package, talk to Fontoumant for your reward.
nodes.description: After you deliver the last package, talk to Fontoumant for your reward.

nodes.title: Speak to either Joulet to begin The Competition or Gallijaux to begin The Rivalry.
nodes.description: Speak to either Joulet to begin The Competition or Gallijaux to begin The Rivalry.

nodes.title: Trade Moat Carps and/or Forest Carps to whichever brother you accepted the quest from until 10,000 f
nodes.description: Trade Moat Carps and/or Forest Carps to whichever brother you accepted the quest from until 10,000 fish are traded. You can talk to the brothers again to see which one you've agreed to help. You can trade multiple stacks at a time.

nodes.title: You receive 10 gil for each Moat Carp and 15 gil for every Forest Carp.
nodes.description: You receive 10 gil for each Moat Carp and 15 gil for every Forest Carp. To learn your current total of fish, speak with Ufanne, who stands watch behind the two bickering fishermen. You may need to talk to the latter multiple times before she'll tell you. While you can talk with the chosen brother to get a number, his count is allegedly the total number all players have traded since last maintenance (source). Disregard it. Only talk with Ufanne.

nodes.title: You will get Lu Shang's Fishing Rod and the Testimonial upon trading the 10,000th carp.
nodes.description: You will get Lu Shang's Fishing Rod and the Testimonial upon trading the 10,000th carp.

nodes.title: If not already unlocked by other Fishing activities, you will now be able to purchase Atma of the Ac
nodes.description: If not already unlocked by other Fishing activities, you will now be able to purchase Atma of the Ace Angler from an Atma Fabricant.

nodes.title: Talk to Sharzalion at the bar in the Lion Springs Tavern.
nodes.description: Talk to Sharzalion at the bar in the Lion Springs Tavern. He wants some Orcish dried food.

nodes.title: To get this food, you need to get a Davoi Storage Key to open the Storage Hole which spawns randomly
nodes.description: To get this food, you need to get a Davoi Storage Key to open the Storage Hole which spawns randomly about Davoi. You need to start this quest while being a Red Mage. It is not necessary to be on Red Mage for the NM to spawn. You only need to have the quest flagged.

nodes.title: Enter Davoi from Jugner Forest and defeat Purpleflash Brukdok around the western half of (E-9)/(F-9)
nodes.description: Enter Davoi from Jugner Forest and defeat Purpleflash Brukdok around the western half of (E-9)/(F-9) to obtain a Davoi Storage Key. Purpleflash Brukdok spawns around the western half of (E-9) / (F-9) when you enter the zone with the RDM AF weapon started. VERY IMPORTANT: you must travel down the river to get to this point. Get down to the river at (I-8) or (J-10) and follow it west to (D-8). There are a few orcs on the way that aggro even at 99. Additionally, all nearby orcs link when fighting the NM. Note: coming /NIN for the NM greatly helps.

nodes.title: Gulemont has lost some very important documents, and needs you to help him find them.
nodes.description: Gulemont has lost some very important documents, and needs you to help him find them.

nodes.title: He can only think of three places they may be, and they're all in West Ronfaure:.
nodes.description: He can only think of three places they may be, and they're all in West Ronfaure:

nodes.title: Talk to Curilla for a cutscene; agree twice to start the quest and obtain Curilla's Bottle.
nodes.description: Talk to Curilla for a cutscene; agree twice to start the quest and obtain Curilla's Bottle.

nodes.title: Go through Yughott Grotto and exit at K-5 into Fort Ghelsba.
nodes.description: Go through Yughott Grotto and exit at K-5 into Fort Ghelsba. Follow the left wall to loop around and re-enter Yughott Grotto at J-8. Once inside, go to J-9 and zone into a small open area of Horlais Peak. There is also a Home Point north of J-9.

nodes.title: Once in Horlais Peak, head south to the Hot Springs, and select it to fill Curilla's Bottle (this ca
nodes.description: Once in Horlais Peak, head south to the Hot Springs, and select it to fill Curilla's Bottle (this causes the key item's description to change).

nodes.title: Return to Chateau d'Oraguille and talk to Curilla to complete the quest.
nodes.description: Return to Chateau d'Oraguille and talk to Curilla to complete the quest.

nodes.title: Go to Cargo Room A in Port San d'Oria and talk to Arminibit or Ceraulian.
nodes.description: Go to Cargo Room A in Port San d'Oria and talk to Arminibit or Ceraulian. Talking with either one will start a dialog between them. It doesn't matter who you pick. If you talk with both, you will get the same dialog the second time.

nodes.title: Talk to Novalmauge in Bostaunieux Oubliette (beneath Chateau d'Oraguille).
nodes.description: Talk to Novalmauge in Bostaunieux Oubliette (beneath Chateau d'Oraguille). You will need to be able to get into the Chateau d'Oraguille, and therefore must be Rank 2 if you are from San d'Oria, or at least have started the 2-3 Mission in Windurst or Bastok Novalmauge patrols between (F-8) to (G-8). If you don't have the map, zone in and follow the hallway south, then turn west. If you have the Scythe weapon skill quest Souls in Shadow active, you cannot complete this part of the quest until you complete the Scythe of Trials. Also, it's possible to obtain the Scythe of Trials while talking to Novalmauge to flag Dragoon. Choose your dialog options carefully.

nodes.title: Talk to Morjean (L-7) in the manuscript room within the Cathedral in Northern San d'Oria.
nodes.description: Talk to Morjean (L-7) in the manuscript room within the Cathedral in Northern San d'Oria. It is on the left as soon as you enter the cathedral. Although the cut-scene with Novalmauge tells you to ask the archeologist Oiheaurese to learn of dragons, he is an NPC who only appears in the cutscene with Morjean.

nodes.title: Buy a pickaxe and head for the Maze of Shakhrami.
nodes.description: Buy a pickaxe and head for the Maze of Shakhrami. Ostalie in Southern San d'Oria sells pickaxes. The Maze of Shakhrami can be reached at (K-5) in the Tahrongi Canyon. There is a Survival Guide at the entrance of the Maze of Shakhrami.

nodes.title: Abeaule, at the inn in Northern San d'Oria, says a customer got sick and needs medicine.
nodes.description: Abeaule, at the inn in Northern San d'Oria, says a customer got sick and needs medicine. (You don't need to zone if you just finished the last quest)

nodes.title: Go to Southern San d'Oria to the second house in Watchdog Alley and talk to Amaura (G-6), who gives
nodes.description: Go to Southern San d'Oria to the second house in Watchdog Alley and talk to Amaura (G-6), who gives you the key item Amaura's formula, which lists the items she needs to make the medicine. She needs one each of the following:

nodes.title: Parvipon (near Southern San d'Oria Home Point #4) needs Rabbit Hides.
nodes.description: Parvipon (near Southern San d'Oria Home Point #4) needs Rabbit Hides. Bring him 3 to reap your reward. You can buy them nearby from Cletae at (D-8) for 80 gil. She's upstairs in the Tanner's Guild.

nodes.title: Speaking with the little elvaan girl, Miene, will activate a cutscene.
nodes.description: Speaking with the little elvaan girl, Miene, will activate a cutscene. You will see a burglar steal something from Altiret, one of the guards.

nodes.title: After the cutscene ends, speak with Altiret.
nodes.description: After the cutscene ends, speak with Altiret. He asks you to retrieve his wife's glasses for him, since he cannot leave his post.

nodes.title: Speak to Miene again to get a quest item Eagle Button.
nodes.description: Speak to Miene again to get a quest item Eagle Button. Informational: You can talk to nearby guards and by-standers, some will report having seen the thief allowing you to pick up the trail.

nodes.title: Travel to (F-6) in West Ronfaure.
nodes.description: Travel to (F-6) in West Ronfaure. You will find Esca in the tower there. Speak with her, and she will deny any accusation, demanding proof.

nodes.title: Trade Esca the Eagle Button and she will admit her guilt.
nodes.description: Trade Esca the Eagle Button and she will admit her guilt. She then gives you the Gilt Glasses.

nodes.title: Return to Port San d'Oria and trade the Gilt Glasses to Altiret for your reward.
nodes.description: Return to Port San d'Oria and trade the Gilt Glasses to Altiret for your reward.

nodes.title: Speak to either Joulet to begin The Competition or Gallijaux to begin The Rivalry.
nodes.description: Speak to either Joulet to begin The Competition or Gallijaux to begin The Rivalry.

nodes.title: Trade Moat Carps and/or Forest Carps to whichever brother you accepted the quest from until 10,000 f
nodes.description: Trade Moat Carps and/or Forest Carps to whichever brother you accepted the quest from until 10,000 fish are traded. You can talk to the brothers again to see which one you've agreed to help. You can trade multiple stacks at a time.

nodes.title: You receive 10 gil for each Moat Carp and 15 gil for every Forest Carp.
nodes.description: You receive 10 gil for each Moat Carp and 15 gil for every Forest Carp. To learn your current total of fish, speak with Ufanne, who stands watch behind the two bickering fishermen. You may need to talk to the latter multiple times before she'll tell you. While you can talk with the chosen brother to get a number, his count is allegedly the total number all players have traded since last maintenance (source). Disregard it. Only talk with Ufanne.

nodes.title: You will get Lu Shang's Fishing Rod and the Testimonial upon trading the 10,000th carp.
nodes.description: You will get Lu Shang's Fishing Rod and the Testimonial upon trading the 10,000th carp.

nodes.title: If not already unlocked by other Fishing activities, you will now be able to purchase Atma of the Ac
nodes.description: If not already unlocked by other Fishing activities, you will now be able to purchase Atma of the Ace Angler from an Atma Fabricant.

nodes.title: You must be Rank 2 or higher in San d'Oria or on Mission 2-3 or higher in Windurst or Bastok to pass
nodes.description: You must be Rank 2 or higher in San d'Oria or on Mission 2-3 or higher in Windurst or Bastok to pass through Chateau d'Oraguille and enter Bostaunieux Oubliette.

nodes.title: Upon entering the Chateau d'Oraguille, go east through an open door, north down a corridor, and down
nodes.description: Upon entering the Chateau d'Oraguille, go east through an open door, north down a corridor, and down curving stairs to I-8. Zone through to the Oubliette.

nodes.title: Travel straight south to H-8, and turn right (West).
nodes.description: Travel straight south to H-8, and turn right (West). Ignore the doors to either side; examining them will send you to almost certain death for anything less than a party of very high level players. (Examine the cells doors to receive a cs hinting at what lies below!) You will find Novalmauge patrolling this hallway on the south side of F-8 to G-8.

nodes.title: Trade Novalmauge a vial of Beastman Blood.
nodes.description: Trade Novalmauge a vial of Beastman Blood.

nodes.title: Hanaa Punaa needs sheepskins to practice her skills.
nodes.description: Hanaa Punaa needs sheepskins to practice her skills. Trade her 3 Sheepskins for your reward.

nodes.title: Vamorcote needs you to find a key that was apparently buried in the Batallia Downs.
nodes.description: Vamorcote needs you to find a key that was apparently buried in the Batallia Downs. If you already have the Engraved Key you do not need to zone and can trade the key to Vamorcote immediately after flagging the quest.

nodes.title: The Engraved Key he is looking for is dropped from an Ahtu, a NM Treant that spawns at (J-11) in the
nodes.description: The Engraved Key he is looking for is dropped from an Ahtu, a NM Treant that spawns at (J-11) in the Batallia Downs on a small island. The key is 100% drop. You should consider doing the quest An Explorer's Footsteps for the Monument in Batallia Downs (J-11) because it is on the same island.

nodes.title: Raimbroy hasn't gotten his supplies in yet, and wants you to help.
nodes.description: Raimbroy hasn't gotten his supplies in yet, and wants you to help. Fetch and trade him 5 honey and he'll reward you.

nodes.title: You will have to talk to Raimbroy twice.
nodes.description: You will have to talk to Raimbroy twice. The first gets you a cutscene, and the second starts the quest proper.

nodes.title: Speak with Abeaule in the Phoenix Perch Inn, who will explain he needs someone to go out and fill an
nodes.description: Speak with Abeaule in the Phoenix Perch Inn, who will explain he needs someone to go out and fill an order he has. If you accept, he will give you a Supplies Order (speak with him again if you lose it).

nodes.title: The Supplies Order is for a clump of Batagreens.
nodes.description: The Supplies Order is for a clump of Batagreens. You can trade the Supplies Order to Phairet in the tower at I-11 in West Ronfaure for the Batagreens. Alternately,you can purchase them from the Cooking Guild in Windurst.

nodes.title: Trade a clump of Batagreens to Abeaule to complete the quest.
nodes.description: Trade a clump of Batagreens to Abeaule to complete the quest.

nodes.title: Speak with Abioleget in Northern San d'Oria in the Cathedral and a cutscene sermon will take place w
nodes.description: Speak with Abioleget in Northern San d'Oria in the Cathedral and a cutscene sermon will take place with you in attendance.

nodes.title: Talk to Abioleget again, and he will offer to sell you some Blue Peas.
nodes.description: Talk to Abioleget again, and he will offer to sell you some Blue Peas. You can trade 70 gil to Abioleget for some Blue Peas.

nodes.title: Vounebariont needs 5 Beetle Shells.
nodes.description: Vounebariont needs 5 Beetle Shells. Trade them to him for your reward.

nodes.title: Taumila at Taumila's Sundries (E-9) in Southern San d'Oria (Home Point #4) wants tiger fangs.
nodes.description: Taumila at Taumila's Sundries (E-9) in Southern San d'Oria (Home Point #4) wants tiger fangs.

nodes.title: Bring her 3 Black Tiger Fangs and she will reward you.
nodes.description: Bring her 3 Black Tiger Fangs and she will reward you. If you are a Novice Bonecrafter, you can buy Black Tiger Fangs from Retto-Marutto for 2,000 gil at the Boneworkers' Guild in Windurst Woods (Home Point #5). Otherwise, Shih Tayuun, who's next to them, might have it in stock. Note: You end up with 8,400 gil per stack; compare prices with AH before choosing what to do.

nodes.title: Talk to Nenne, who can be found in the third house in Watchdog Alley.
nodes.description: Talk to Nenne, who can be found in the third house in Watchdog Alley. After talking with her, you will now have access to page 3 of the diary.

nodes.title: Page 3 may not be viewed while the quest The Medicine Woman is active, but will show up immediately
nodes.description: Page 3 may not be viewed while the quest The Medicine Woman is active, but will show up immediately after completion.

nodes.title: Go to the top floor of the first house in Watchdog Alley (G-7), there is a diary.
nodes.description: Go to the top floor of the first house in Watchdog Alley (G-7), there is a diary. You must read one page in order for the next one to show up, so you have to read the pages in order. If you do not get the option to read all three pages, you may not have enough fame. Page 3 tells you what item is needed to cure a cough.

nodes.title: Speak with Amaura in the second house in Watchdog Alley.
nodes.description: Speak with Amaura in the second house in Watchdog Alley. She asks you to bring her some Thyme Moss.

nodes.title: Thyme Moss can be found by clicking on the ??? at (F-9) in Davoi, the Orcish stronghold.
nodes.description: Thyme Moss can be found by clicking on the ??? at (F-9) in Davoi, the Orcish stronghold. To get there you must enter the river at (H-8) or (J-10) (the J-10 route is probably safer as it allows you to bypass the high-level mobs in the central part of Davoi) and travel west through the river to get to the land at (D-8). Next go east all the way till you find a plank of wood. Under the plank is the ???.

nodes.title: Return to Amaura and she will give you some Cough Medicine.
nodes.description: Return to Amaura and she will give you some Cough Medicine.

nodes.title: Take the syrup to Nenne, who will give you a Scroll of Treasure as a reward.
nodes.description: Take the syrup to Nenne, who will give you a Scroll of Treasure as a reward. Now the quest will appear on your completed quests list. Optional: The Scroll of Treasure allows you to receive 3000 gil from a signpost at (H-6) in East Ronfaure.

nodes.title: Speak to Gulmama in Northern San d'Oria (E-7).
nodes.description: Speak to Gulmama in Northern San d'Oria (E-7). If you have sufficient fame, she will give you a Tuning fork of ice.

nodes.title: Travel to Fei'Yin and head to the Cloister of Frost.
nodes.description: Travel to Fei'Yin and head to the Cloister of Frost. You can use the Home Point #2 to get there quickly, if you have been there before. To get to the Cloister of Frost, enter Fei'Yin from Beaucedine Glacier at (J-4). Follow the path to a large room and take the east passage. Ignore the branch south and pass through a small room, turn north and follow the path back west. Ignore the branch north and descend the stairs; leading you to the second map. The path forces you north and east, again, and into a small room (H-8). Here, follow the left wall (north) until it opens into a large room (full of Utukkus, Golems and Bats); continue north. The north exit (a short distance from where you entered) leads a winding path through several small rooms (populated by Specters, then Weapons), eventually leading to the Cloister of Frost.

nodes.title: Once you defeat Shiva Prime, you will acquire the Whisper of Frost.
nodes.description: Once you defeat Shiva Prime, you will acquire the Whisper of Frost.

nodes.title: Return the Whisper to Gulmama for your reward.
nodes.description: Return the Whisper to Gulmama for your reward.

nodes.title: Speak to Castilchat in Northern San d'Oria.
nodes.description: Speak to Castilchat in Northern San d'Oria. You must speak to Castilchat as a Summoner.

nodes.title: If you qualify, he will give you a Mini Tuning Fork of Ice.
nodes.description: If you qualify, he will give you a Mini Tuning Fork of Ice. (Note: You only have to be level 15 to get the fork.)

nodes.title: Belgidiveau thinks the watergate may have been poisoned and asks you to get a counteragent for it.
nodes.description: Belgidiveau thinks the watergate may have been poisoned and asks you to get a counteragent for it.

nodes.title: Head to Bostaunieux Oubliette and talk to Novalmauge and ask him to make the counteragent.
nodes.description: Head to Bostaunieux Oubliette and talk to Novalmauge and ask him to make the counteragent.

nodes.title: He needs you to get a Dahlia first.
nodes.description: He needs you to get a Dahlia first.

nodes.title: Trade a Dahlia to Novalmauge and receive the Neutralizer (key item).
nodes.description: Trade a Dahlia to Novalmauge and receive the Neutralizer (key item).

nodes.title: Return to Belgidiveau to complete the quest.
nodes.description: Return to Belgidiveau to complete the quest.

nodes.title: Travel to (L-6) Southern San d'Oria and speak to Gondebaud to activate the quest and receive a Red i
nodes.description: Travel to (L-6) Southern San d'Oria and speak to Gondebaud to activate the quest and receive a Red institute card.

nodes.title: Travel to (D-9) Northern San d'Oria and speak with Excenmille for a cutscene and Trust: Excenmille.
nodes.description: Travel to (D-9) Northern San d'Oria and speak with Excenmille for a cutscene and Trust: Excenmille. If this is not your first Trust spell, you will also receive the San d'Oria Trust permit and complete the quest at this point. If this is your first Trust spell, cast Trust: Excenmille in either West Ronfaure or East Ronfaure, then return to Excenmille to receive the San d'Oria Trust permit and complete the quest.

nodes.title: Go to Chateau d'Oraguille and click on the door to Prince Trion's chambers.
nodes.description: Go to Chateau d'Oraguille and click on the door to Prince Trion's chambers. (If you were a Paladin when you completed A Boy's Dream, you may have already received this cutscene.) Note: This quest takes priority over receiving the Trust: Trion spell. If you are trying to receive the trust spell, you may have to click on the door multiple times until you receive the proper cutscene for it.

nodes.title: You find Pagisalis in the Reliquary on the bottom floor of the Cathedral.
nodes.description: You find Pagisalis in the Reliquary on the bottom floor of the Cathedral.

nodes.title: He wants 2 beeswax to make sacred candles.
nodes.description: He wants 2 beeswax to make sacred candles.

nodes.title: Buy or craft these and give them to him for your reward.
nodes.description: Buy or craft these and give them to him for your reward.

nodes.title: Buy a Cupboard from Justi's Furniture shop in Northern San d'Oria, place it in your Mog House, and d
nodes.description: Buy a Cupboard from Justi's Furniture shop in Northern San d'Oria, place it in your Mog House, and display it using Layout. The Cupboard is Exclusive, but this item can be sent via Delivery Box to other characters on the same Playonline ID.

nodes.title: Zone out of and back into your Mog House and talk to your Moogle to receive a Small teacup.
nodes.description: Zone out of and back into your Mog House and talk to your Moogle to receive a Small teacup. If zoning out and back doesn't work, try zoning out, travel to another Mog House Home Point in the same city, and re-enter the Mog House. If you have already completed a Furniture Quest this Conquest Tally, remove all other Furniture Quest furniture items, and then try again. Once the Small teacup is acquired, the Cupboard can be removed. It is not necessary to keep it displayed to complete the quest.

nodes.title: Head back to the furniture shop and talk to Morunaude.
nodes.description: Head back to the furniture shop and talk to Morunaude. Optional: Talk with Morunaude a second time; she mentions Calovour.

nodes.title: Head to the Cathedral in Northern San d'Oria and talk to Calovour, who asks you for a Mistletoe.
nodes.description: Head to the Cathedral in Northern San d'Oria and talk to Calovour, who asks you for a Mistletoe.

nodes.title: Trade a mistletoe to Calovour to complete the quest.
nodes.description: Trade a mistletoe to Calovour to complete the quest.

nodes.title: Maloquedil needs garlic to ward off the vampire living in the dungeon under the Chateau d'Oraguille.
nodes.description: Maloquedil needs garlic to ward off the vampire living in the dungeon under the Chateau d'Oraguille.

nodes.title: Shaman Garlic can be obtained by killing Orcish Cursemakers.
nodes.description: Shaman Garlic can be obtained by killing Orcish Cursemakers.

nodes.title: Trade him two Shaman Garlic to receive your reward.
nodes.description: Trade him two Shaman Garlic to receive your reward.

nodes.title: {Northern San d'Oria} Speak with Miageau (L-7) just past the entrance to the Cathedral.
nodes.description: {Northern San d'Oria} Speak with Miageau (L-7) just past the entrance to the Cathedral. Buy a Blessed Waterskin by trading 10g to Nouveil (to your right).

nodes.title: Trade the waterskin to the Cheval River target East Ronfaure (H-5) (top of the river) to receive Che
nodes.description: Trade the waterskin to the Cheval River target East Ronfaure (H-5) (top of the river) to receive Cheval Water.

nodes.title: {Northern San d'Oria} Trade Cheval Water to Miageau.
nodes.description: {Northern San d'Oria} Trade Cheval Water to Miageau.
